ESTHER ESTA EN LA FOTOGRAFÍA CON UNA CHOMPA ROSADA Y CASACA PLOMA, Y ES LA PRIMERA FOTOGRAFÍA QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN LA PARTE SUPERIOR IZQUIERDA; JUNTO A ELLA ESTA ESTELA CON UNA CASACA NEGRA Y CHOMPA NARANJA.
texts.en:
The “Las Abejitas” (The Little Bees) is a very compact group; it has 14 members.  Esther is one of this communal bank’s members and she stands out for being one of the most punctual and responsible members of the group.  She sells clothes both at wholesale and retail for men, women and children, that is to say, she has a small bazaar.  Thanks to her business she’s been able to support her minor son who is school age since she’s a single mother.

Esther relates that due to the local patron saint feast day the number of customers increases which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise like pants, shirts, jackets, stockings, etc.  In the future, Esther would like to have a more spacious locale to better display her merchandise.

In the photo, Esther is wearing a pink sweater and gray jacket and she’s first on the left on top.  Next to her is Estela wearing a black jacket and orange sweater.

loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Las Malvinas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Susana  es casada, tiene 3 hijos, actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Las Malvinas” grupo  conformado por 10 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Susana   trabaja desde hace 9 años en la venta  de comida este trabajo  surge a raíz de que a su esposo ganaba sueldo mínimo y no podía cubrir los  gastos básicos,  alimentación,  educación y pago de servicios,  es así que Susana   pone su puesto de comida, hoy en día tiene muchos clientes y eso le genera buena ganancia y también desde hace cuatro años se dedica a la venta de zapatos y prendas de vestir junto a su esposo y las prendas y zapatos los vende en provincia Susana  trabajo muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia,  gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mejores ingresos económicos , sus hijos van a colegios privado,  y sobre todo  su familia tiene una mejor calidad de vida  ,  con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería prendas de vestir y zapatos . Susana cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Susana’s married and has three children.  She’s currently a member of the “Las Malvinas” communal bank which has 10 members who carry out a variety of commercial activities.  Susana has worked for the last nine years selling food.  This business arose because her husband earned minimum wage which was insufficient to cover basic costs, food, education and utility payments which is why Susana opened a food stand.  Today, she has many customers and earns good profits.  

In addition, for the last four years she’s also been selling shoes and clothes with her husband; they sell the shoes and clothes out in the province.  Susana worked very hard to move her family forward and thanks to her effort and dedication has succeeded in improving her income.  Her children attend private school and above all her family has a better quality of life.  

Aiming at continuing to grow, she’s asked for a new loan to buy clothes and shoes.  Susana will reach her goals with much work and effort and Edaprospo believes its loans will help.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Jesse

texts.en:
Jesse's priority in life is to raise his family's standard of living. Through farming, Jesse is able to meet his family's needs and pay his children's school fees on time. He is 43 years old, is married and has three children in school. Jesse’s wife is a housekeeper.

Despite financial difficulties he has encountered, Jesse is working hard to further meet his family's needs. At present, Jesse can’t afford to buy farm inputs he needs for his farm. In this regard, Jesse is asking for a loan of 50,000 PHP to buy seeds to grow and fertilizers and insecticides for plant care.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hard-working mother of four who is engaged in the farming business. She is enjoying doing farming activities to earn profits. 

Teresita is 62 years of age and is married. Teresita wants to maintain the business while she can manage it. She gets a financial shortage because her expenditures in farming have increased. Cost of farm inputs now is increasing. Thus, Teresita is requesting a loan of P50,000 to buy farm inputs like seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to use in her farm. She believes that the loan will have a positive impact for the growth of her farming business.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to use in her farm.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is a thirty-four-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. Her personal goals are to build a permanent home and upgrade herself in her studies. She is a teacher by profession and she also practices mixed farming. Her main hardships are price fluctuation, inflation and soil exhaustion since she farms on slopes exposed to soil erosion. She has a vision of venturing into modern farming methods and starting a retail shop. Ruth needs a loan to buy fertilizers and mulch her plantations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and mulch her plantations.

loans.name: Estrelita

texts.en:
Hard work, patience and dedication are the weapons in overcoming trials in life, says Estrelita. She is married with four children. Two of them are married, another one currently goes to school and the other is working. 

Estrelita has been running her general store for 16 years. Her husband's occupation is farmer. The couple both work hard to be able to supply the basic needs of their family and support the studies of their one child who is studying. Estrelita's income goes immediately to their basic necessities, allowances of that child and some amount is used for maintenance of her rice field. 

With her determination to gain more income and satisfy her customers' demand, she is asking for a loan amount of P40,000. She will use this loan in buying groceries so that she can economize her fare expenses in going to and from the market and re-stocking her store. In addition, she could save her time and effort. Estrelita believes that she could be a better entrepreneur someday.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables and pickle containers

loans.name: Emad

texts.en:
Emad is a 35-year-old young man. He is married and a father to two daughters.

For the past 12 years, Emad has been repairing vehicles and selling spare parts, which has been a profitable project, but he needs more support to cover the family's needs.

Emad is requesting a loan of 1,000 US dollars (USD) from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new repairing kit and more vehicle spare parts. This will improve the quality of his work and increase the size of his work, which will improve the family's income. Emad is photographed in his workshop.

loans.use: To purchase a new repairing kit and vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Las Gaviotas  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Gaviotas está formada por 9 mujeres quienes viven por la parroquia de Baños, la mayor parte de su territorio está incluida dentro de las declaratorias de Bosques y Vegetación Protectoras conocidos como “Yanuncay” y “Sunsun Yanasacha”, áreas de protección de la Cuenca del Río Paute. Ubicada al suroccidente de la Ciudad de Cuenca, este lugar es visitado por su gastronomía en donde se venden una gran variedad de platos típicos y por sus piscinas de aguas termales. Su gente es amable, gentil y muy trabajadora, laboran en diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares sacando  adelante a toda su familia, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Dolores,  tiene 47 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 4 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad, están casados y viven independientes, ella está al cuidado de 3 nietos quienes estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en la agricultura, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña María Dolores se dedica a la elaboración de canastas, actividad que la desempeña desde muy joven ya que este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres, sus productos los vende recorriendo los mercados de la ciudad. También se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos y cuyes.
 
Este es el tercer crédito que realizan en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes, cerdos y alimento para sus animales.
 
Su sueño es viajar a los Estados Unidos.
texts.en:
The “Las Gaviotas” (The Seagulls) communal bank has nine women members who live in Baños Parish.  Most of its territory is included within the boundaries of the “Yanuncay” and “Sunsun Yanasacha” nature preserves, protected areas in the Paute River Basin.  It’s located southwest of the city of 
Cuenca and it’s popular because of its great variety of typical dishes and for its thermal water swimming pools.  Its residents are nice, kind and very hardworking.  They work in various activities that make it possible for them to cover household expenses and to support their entire families.  They still preserve their native traditions.

One of the group members is María Dolores, 47.  She lives in a common law relationship and has had four children who are all married adults now living on their own.  She cares for three grandchildren who are attending the local elementary school.  Her husband works in agriculture and they own the house they live in.

María Dolores is a basket weaver, an activity she’s carried out since she was very young since she learned it from her parents.  She sells her wares from market to market in the city.  She also works raising pigs and guinea pigs to sell.

This is communal bank’s third loan and she will use it to buy guinea pigs, pigs and animal feed.    Her dream is to travel to the United States.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Taha

texts.en:
Taha is 28 years old, married, and has three children. He lives in Aden, Yemen. Previously, he worked in a telecommunication shop, introducing phone services and selling mobile recharge cards to his customers. He has been involved in this kind of business since 2008. After collecting enough money, he opened a telecommunication shop. 

Taha is requesting a loan for 300,000 YER from AMB Bank, which he will use to purchase mobile recharge cards and mobiles to sell to his customers and to develop services for his telecommunications shop.  He needed the loan to purchase more goods for the shop to meet the demands of his clients.  In the future, he hopes to be a successful merchant in order to buy a phone accessories store and earn an increased income, which will enable him to pay his obligations in school and some of his household expenditures.

loans.use: to purchase mobile recharge cards and mobiles for his business.

loans.name: Los Laureles  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Los Laureles está formado por 6 socias y 1 socio quienes trabajan en diferentes actividades pero en especial a las labores del campo como la cría de animales y la agricultura, estas actividades les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y mejorar su estabilidad económica, son personas amables, gentiles y muy cordiales. Viven por la parroquia  Victoria del Portete en Cuenca, lugar que tiene un clima frió,  sus extensas llanuras son propicias para la cría de ganado, tiene diversos lugares para visitar y disfrutar de la naturaleza. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Bilma, tiene 29 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 7 y 6 años de edad, quienes estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en cualquier trabajo que le salga, pero su fuerte es la de albañil, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
Doña Bilma desde que tenía 12 años se dedica al arte del bordado, labora desde su casa de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo, esta actividad aprendió trabajando. También cría y vende ganado, cerdos, cuyes y gallinas.
 
Este es el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de hilos y telas para continuar con su negocio.

Su meta es ampliar su casa. 

La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The “Los Laureles” communal bank has six female members and one male member who work in various activities but especially in field work like raising animals and farming.  These activities allow them to cover household expenses and improve their economic stability.  They are nice, kind and very cordial people.  They live in Portete Parish in Cuenca, a place with a cold climate.  Its extensive plains make it apt for raising cattle.  It has various places to visit and enjoy nature.

One of this group’s members is Bilma, 29.  She’s married and has two children who are 7 and 6 years of age and attend the local elementary school.  Her husband works in whatever jobs he can get but his specialty is bricklaying.  They own the house they live in.

Bilma has been working embroidering since the age of 12.  She works from home Monday through Saturday with no fixed work schedule.  She learned this activity on the job.  She also raises cattle, pigs, guinea pigs and chickens to sell.

This is the fourth loan she’s taken in the communal bank and she will use it to buy thread and fabric to continue with her business.  Her goal is to enlarge her house.

The small photo is of a member who was unable to be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Sami

texts.en: Sami, a 44-year-old married father of two, lives in Sana`a, Yemen where he is an employer looking to improve his family's living conditions. He is requesting a loan of 280000 YER from AMB to finance a new bedroom for his house.

loans.use: to finance a new bedroom for his house.

loans.name: Trabajando Juntos  (Rocafuerte) Group

texts.es:
En  el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Trabajando Juntos. Este grupo está integrado por 12 mujeres  y 2 hombres, este lugar se lo conoce por los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país. Ellos unieron sus esfuerzos para poder acceder a los beneficios que presta la Fundación Espoir, con el cual espera aumentar sus negocios para el bienestar de sus familias.

En este grupo conocimos a la señora Dolores, tiene 50 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció y quedo viuda, pero de esta relación tiene cinco hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa.

Nuestra amiga para salir adelante junto a su familia, tiene una tienda en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, uno de sus hijos le ayudan en su trabajo cuando está desocupado, pero por lo general es nuestra amiga la que mas pasa en su negocio ya que nos comenta que es allí donde le gusta estar ya que además de ganarse la vida se entretiene y se olvida de su soledad. Tiene un año con su negocio y le va muy bien  pesar del corto tiempo que lleva con él, antes tenía un restaurante pero lo cerro porque era muy cansado para ella.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Este es el primer ciclo del grupo, ella es la presidenta del mismo y espera seguir por mucho tiempo. 

Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the Rocafuerte canton the Trabajando Juntos [Working Together] communal bank meets every two weeks. This group is made up of 12 women and 2 men. The place is known for the delicious candies made by the locals and that are known throughout the country. They pooled their strengths to be able to access the benefits offered by the Fundación Espoir. With it, they hope to grow their businesses for their families' wellbeing. 

In this group we met Dolores. She is 50 years old and several years ago her beloved husband died and she became a widow. From her marriage she has 5 children who are all grown. Two of them live in her house. 

Our friend, in order to get ahead with her family, has a store in her house There she sells all types of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, vegetables, legumes and fruit. She works everyday from 6 a.m. until 20 p.m. and sometimes even later. One of her children helps with the work when he isn't busy, but generally it's our friend who is at the business. She tells us that she likes being there since besides earning a living she is entertained and forgets her lonliness. She has had her business for a year and it is going very well despite the brief time she has had it. She had a restaurant before but she closed it because it was very tiring for her. 

She is going to use this loan to stock up her store more. She is going to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, deli meats and other basis necessity products. this is her first cycle with the group. She is the president of it and hopes to continue in it for a long time.

Her goals are to get ahead in her business and for her store to grow mare every day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, deli meats and other basic necessity products.

loans.name: Villa Nueva Nº 3 Group

texts.es:
Doña Jilma es casada, tiene 53 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos, su esposo se dedica a la caficultura, ella es una persona muy amable, servicial y alegre, y tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación. Hace 32 años comenzó con el negocio de la pulpería vendiendo productos como ser: azúcar, arroz, manteca, frijoles y otros productos de uso domestico. 
Inicio a trabajar por cuenta propia y en el transcurso del tiempo aprendió a manejar su negocio, su horario de atención inicia a partir de las 6:30 a.m. y culmina a las 8:00 p.m. Doña Jilma solicita este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de productos como ser: arroz, azúcar, manteca, sal, frijoles, entre otros. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá surtir su negocio y seguir teniendo una fuente de ingresos para poder apoyar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de su familia. Su meta es comprar una finca de café con los ahorros y hacer más grande el negocio de la pulpería. Doña Jilma tiene 3 ciclos de recibir el apoyo de FAMA mediante los préstamos obtenidos y ha mantenido un  buen comportamiento de pago.
texts.en:
Jilma’s married.  She’s 53-years-old and has four children.  Her husband is a coffee grower.  She’s a very nice, accommodating, cheerful person who has a small home-based grocery store.  She stared the grocery store business 32 years ago selling products like sugar, rice, lard, beans and other domestic use products.

She started working on her own initiative and in time learned how to run her business.  Her daily work schedule is 6:30am to 8pm.  Jilma is asking for this loan to buy products like rice, sugar, lard, salt and beans, among others.  

With support from this loan she’ll be able to stock her store and continue to have a source of income to help her husband support their family.  Her goal is to buy a coffee plantation with her savings and to enlarge the grocery store.  Jilma has received FAMA help for three cycles by means of loans obtained and she’s maintained a good payment history.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Sandra Marisol

texts.es: Sandra tiene 48 años de edad es profesora titulado de primero de basica. En el año 1986 la escuela en la que trabajaba la pusieron en venta y viendo aqui la oportunidad decidio reunir sus ingresos y la compro, en ese tiempo la infraestructura era pequeña pero con el tiempo y gracias a 2 de sus hermanos quienes la apoyaron pudieron crecer mucho más. Ahora es particular para brindar un mejor servicio ya que la docencia es la que más le gusta. Ahora ella es la dueña y realiza las funciones de Rectora y profesora de la institución, labora desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde. Una de sus mayores preocupaciones es enfermarse de la gastritis debido a que no tiene horario fijo en las comidas pero se siente satisfecha por su trabajo. El préstamo que está solicitando es para la compra de libros y uniformes para ayudar a los niños de su escuela. Su meta para los siguientes 5 años será aumentar los cursos construyendo un piso adicional y así aumentar la capacidad de estudiantes ya que cada año se queda sin cupos disponibles.
texts.en: Sandra is 48 years old and is an elementary school teacher. In 1986 the school she worked in was put up for sale and seeing an opportunity she fot her savings together and bought it. At that time, the infrastructure was small but over time and thanks to her 2 brothers who helped her they were able to make it grow much more. Now it is private to offer better service because the teaching staff likes it more. Now she is the owner and acts in the capacity of Principal and teacher of the institution. She works from 7 in the morning until 3 in the afternoon. One of her biggest worries is falling ill with gastritis, since she has no set schedule for meals, but she is satisfied with her work. The loan she is asking for is to buy books and uniforms for the children in her school. Her goal for the next 5 years is to increase the number of grades by building an additional floor and thus increase the student capacity, since every year she has no available places.

loans.use: to buy books and uniforms.

loans.name: Bibijamo

texts.ru: Бибичамо родилась 1960 году в районе Хамадони. Она замужем. У нее шестеро детей. Бибичамо более 12 лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Она трудолюбивый и хороший человек. Бибичамо работает усердно, чтобы получить хороший урожай для продажи. Она берет кредит для повторного посева овощей.
texts.en: Bibijamo was born in 1960 in the Hamadoni district.  She is married and has six children.  Bibijamo has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 12 years.  She is a hardworking and good person.  Bibijamo works diligently to get a good harvest for sale.  She is requesting this loan for a repeat sowing of vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
En  el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Agrupación 24 De Mayo. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Sandra, tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 12, 10 y 6 años de edad  los mismos que estudian en colegio el mayor y en escuela los menores. El marido se dedica a la agricultura y al  comercio.
 
Nuestra amiga con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatillas, sabanas, edredones, cortinas y otros productos,  su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local, nos cuenta que la mayoría de sus ventas son bajo pedidos que le realizan sus clientes. Trabaja tres o cuatro días por semana,  deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil o Santo Domingo dependiendo donde le salga más barato. Tiene tres años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas, edredones, cortinas, sabanas y otras cosas que vende. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe de los créditos.
 
Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The members of Agrupación 24 De Mayo Communal Bank meet every 15 days in Rocafuerte canton. This place is known for the delicious sweets its inhabitants prepare, which are appreciated throughout the country.

Sandra lives here. She is 31 years old and lives with her common-law partner with whom she has three children, who are 12, 10 and 6 years of age and in secondary and elementary school. Her husband is a farmer and trader.

Our friend, with the goal of earning something on her own and getting ahead, is dedicated to selling clothing, sneakers, sheets, comforters, curtains and other products. She sells door to door and also from her house, where she has a small shop. She notes that the majority of her sales are on orders she takes from her customers. She works three or four days a week, sells on credit and collects from her clients every fifteen days. She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil or Santo Domingo, depending on where she gets the best price. She has had this business for three years and it is going well.

Sandra will use the loan to purchase more merchandise, such as pants, blouses, T-shirts, comforters, curtains, sheets and other products she sells. She has been a member of her communal bank since its inception and she enjoys it because of the help she receives through loans.

Her dream is to provide the best for her children.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, T-shirts, comforters, curtains, sheets, etc.

loans.name: Eduardo Rafael

texts.es:
El señor Eduardo es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor de 38 años, casado y tiene tres hijos de 6, 3 y 2 años de edad. Él es propietario de un cyber, negocio que inicio  hace 8 años con 6 máquinas. En la actualidad el cyber cuenta con  12 máquinas, además con el crédito pasado diversifico su negocio con  una tienda de libros y ropa.
El crédito lo invertirá en mercadería para la librería.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 38, is a hardworking and enterprising man.  He is married and has 3 children aged 6, 3 and 2.  He owns an internet cafe, a business that he started 8 years ago with 6 computers.  Now his cafe has 12 computers, and with his previous loan he diversified his business to include a store selling books and clothing.

He will invest this loan in stationery items for his store.

loans.use:
to buy merchandise for his store, such as notebooks, pens, pencils, etc.
.

loans.name: Ingrid Daniela

texts.es:
En  el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Agrupación 24 De Mayo. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Ingrid, tiene 19 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un  hijo de un año de edad. El marido es comerciante.
 
Nuestra joven amiga realiza el crédito para el negocio del esposo, el cual se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado, nos cuenta nuestra amiga que su suegro tiene un camión el cual utiliza su esposo para trasladarse hasta Pedernales, ahí compra el pescado y luego lo traslada a la ciudad de Manta lugar en el que entrega a empresas de este importante puerto manabita. El lleva más de dos años en este negocio el cual les deja muy buenos ingresos.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar pescado. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace dos ciclos y le gusta porque con los créditos ella puede ayudar a su marido a financiar su negocio el cual les permite ganarse la vida.
 
Sus sueños son tener su casa y su camión propio.
texts.en:
The members of the Community Bank Group "24th of May" meet every two weeks in the town of Rocafuerte, Ecuador. This place is famous throughout the country for the delicious sweets made by the locals.

Ingrid, who is 19 years old, lives here.  She has a domestic partner with whom she has one son who is one year old.  Her partner is a businessman.

She is requesting a loan for her partner's business, which consists of buying and selling fish.  Ingrid's father has a truck which her ​​husband uses to travel to Pedernales, where he buys the fish.  He then transports the fish to the city of Manta, an important Manabí port, where he delivers to companies.  He has been in the business for more than two years and is earning very good income.
 
She will use this loan to buy fish.  She has been with the Community Bank for two loan cycles.  She likes being a member because the loans enable her to help her partner to finance his business, allowing them to earn a living.

Her dream is to own her own home and her own truck.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Claudia Margarita Monserrate

texts.es:
En  el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Agrupación 24 De Mayo. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Claudia, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos todos mayores de edad,  dos de  ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga como varias personas del cantón se dedica a la elaboración de dulces, nos cuenta que ella le da forma y sabor a sus dulces para que sean degustado por las personas de su ciudad y de otras donde se venden sus dulces, su esposo es el que luego de que ella prepara sus dulces se encarga de llevara a Guayaquil lugar donde los vende a muy buen precio ya que estos son muy apreciados por su delicioso sabor, ella lleva más de 25 años dedicada a esta labor la misma que aprendió de su mamá.
 
Este crédito es para  comprar todo tipo de ingredientes como frutas tropicales, leche, azúcar,etc. para preparara sus deliciosos dulces. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque los créditos son a muy bajos intereses. 

Sus sueños son compara un carro y arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
The members of the “Agrupación 24 de Mayo” communal bank meet every fifteen days in Rocafuerte Canton.  This place is known for the delicious sweets locals make that are famous throughout the country.

Claudia, 48, is married and has three children who are all adults now; two of them still live with her and her husband is a merchant. Like many people in the canton, Claudia makes sweets.  She relates that she shapes and flavors the sweets so that people from her city as well as others in places where her sweets are sold can enjoy them . Her husband is the one in charge of taking the sweets she makes to Guayaquil to sell at very good prices because they are very highly esteemed there because of their delicious flavor.  She’s been in this business for more than 25 years having learned it from her mother.

This loan is to buy various types of ingredients like tropical fruit, milk, sugar, etc. to make her delicious sweets.  She’s been in the communal bank since the beginning and likes it because the loans are very low interest.  Her dream is to buy a car and fix up her house.

loans.use: to buy tropical fruit, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Aidalina

texts.es:
Aidalina Esmeralda es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una repostería desde hace 4 años. Este negocio lo inicio después de estudiar repostería; ya que en antes realizaba enchiladas y tajadas con queso. En la repostería cuenta dos ayudantes para despachar y entregar.
Ella con el crédito anterior logro comprar una cocina más apropiada lo que le ha permitido aumentar la producción. Este préstamo lo invertirá en materia prima y en la compra de moldes.
texts.en: Aidalina Esmeralda is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has had a confectionery shop for 4 years.  She started this business after taking patisserie classes.  Prior to this, she was making enchiladas and "tajadas con queso" (a dish of fried plantains with cheese).  In her confectionery shop, she has two assistants to pack up and deliver her products.  With her previous loan, she managed to buy a more appropriate oven, which has allowed her to increase her production.  She will invest this loan in the purchase of raw materials and cake molds.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, butter, sugar, ..etc.

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru:
Иброхим житель города Дангара. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Двое его сыновей работают, а двое младших учатся в школе. 
Иброхим работает на рынке. Он более 27 лет занимается торговлей. На сегодняшний день Иброхим арендует торговую точку, где занимается продажей овощей. Иброхим в основном продает картошку, морковку и лук. Кредит берет для закупа овощей.
texts.en: Ibrohim is a resident of the city of Dangara.  He is 43 years old, married and has four children.  Two of his sons work, and two youngest attend a school.  Ibrohim works at a market.  He has been involved in sales for over 27 years.  Today, Ibrohim leases a retail outlet, where he sells vegetables.  Ibrohim primarily sells potatoes, carrots and onions.  He is requesting this loan to purchase vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes and onions

loans.name: Ra'nogul

texts.ru: Раъногул жительница города Дангара. Ей 41 год. Она вдова. У нее четверо детей. Трое ее детей учатся в средней школе. Раъногул портниха. Она занимается шитьем национальных платьев у себя дома. Раъногул десять лет занимается этим видом деятельности. Она просит кредит для приобретения новой модернизированной машинки.
texts.en: Ra'nogul is a resident of the Dangara district.  She is 41 years old, a widow and has four children, three of whom attend a secondary school.  Ra'nogul is a seamstress.  She is involved in sewing national dresses at home.  Ra'nogul has been in this business for ten years.  She is requesting this loan to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Nurmahmad

texts.ru: Нурмахмад проживает в городе Дангара. Ему 51 год. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Нурмахмад имеет средне-специальное образование, он водитель. Нурмахмад уже три года как развозит пассажиров по маршруту Душанбе-Дангара. Он просит кредит для ремонта своего автомобиля.
texts.en: Nurmahmad lives in the city of Dangara.  He is 51 years old, married and has four children.  Nurmahmad has a secondary-specialized education and is a driver.  He has been transporting passengers along the Dushanbe-Dangara route for three years.  Nurmahmad is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Barbarita  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En El Florón de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socios  del Banco Comunal Barbarita. Los mismos que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio en general, servicios, entre otras actividades.
 
La señora Patricia pertenece a este grupo el cual está formado de 14 mujeres y 2 hombres, los mismos que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio en general, servicios, entre otras cosas. Ellos hace tiempo atrás unieron sus esfuerzos para poder acceder a los beneficios que presta la Fundación Espoir,  durante el tiempo que llevan se sienten muy bien por la ayuda recibida, la señora Patricia tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 2 hijas de 7 y 1 año de edad, la mayor esta en escuela . Su marido es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga realiza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo en su negocio, él se dedica al comercio,  vende de toda clase de productos como plátano, pescado, sandias, etc. sale todos los días en un carro que hace un año compraron para realizar sus recorridos, esto lo realiza por las mañanas mientras que por las tardes también reparte agua en botellones a domicilio con lo cual le queda cierta ganancia extra, él tiene más de 8 años con su negocio pero antes lo hacía en triciclo hasta que compro su carro que aunque está un poco deteriorado le es de mucha utilidad.

Este crédito lo esperan utilizar para comprar pescado, plátano y  para reparar su carro. Este  es su segundo ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le bridan los créditos. 

Sus sueños son tener un pequeño camión nuevo y  darles lo mejor a sus hijas.
texts.en:
The members of the “Barbarita” communal bank meet every fifteen days in El Florón in the city of Portoviejo.  They carry out various activities like general commerce and services, among other activities.

Patricia belongs to this group which contains 14 women and 2 men all of whom carry out a variety of activities like general commerce, services and others.  They joined their efforts some time ago in order to access benefits from Fundación Espoir and during the time they’ve been together they’ve felt very good about the help received. 

Patricia is 27-years-old, married and has two daughters who are 7 years and 1 year old; her oldest daughter attends school and her husband’s a merchant.  She is taking out the loan to help her husband with his business; he’s a merchant who sells all sorts of things like plantain, fish, sandals, etc.  He goes out daily in a car they bought a year ago to do his rounds.  He does this in the morning because in the afternoon he also home delivers large containers of bottled water which produces a bit of extra profit for him.  He’s been in business more than 8 years but he used to do it with a three-wheeled cart until he bought his car which even though is a bit deteriorated is still very useful.

They hope to use this loan to buy fish, plantain and to repair their car.  This is her second cycle in the communal bank and she likes it because of the help the loans provide.  Her dream is to own a small, new truck and to provide her daughters with the best.

loans.use: to buy fish and plantain and to repair the cart.

loans.name: Marvori

texts.ru: Марвори 43-летняя женщина проживающая в городе Душанбе. Она живет с мужем. У них четверо детей. Марвори занимается торговлей. Она арендует торговую точку, где продает хозяйственные товары, парфюмерию и косметику. Этим видом деятельности Марвори занимается более семи лет. Она берет кредит для покупки выше перечисленного товара с целью увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Marvori is a 43 year-old woman living in the city of Dushanbe.  She lives with her husband, and they have four children.  Marvori is involved in sales.  She leases a retail outlet, where she sells household goods, perfumes and cosmetics.  Marvori has been involved in this business for over seven years.  She is requesting this loan to purchase the above-mentioned merchandise in order to increase goods turnover.

loans.use: to purchase household goods, perfumes and cosmetics

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María es socia del Banco Comunal Maria Celeste, tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos (1 varón y tres mujeres). Es socia de FINCA Perú hace. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos y lana en su tienda. Ella nos comenta que gracias a que FINCA Perú le enseñó a ahorrar ella ha podido superar los momentos difíciles que se le presentaron, de esta manera cuando ella necesita por urgencia disponer de dinero tiene sus ahorros que la ayudan. Su sueño para el futuro es comprar una casa en la capital donde ahora estudian sus hijos y así poder vivir cerca a ellos. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, zapatos, zapatillas, diversos tipos de lana.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Communal Bank “Maria Celeste”. She is 49 years old, married, and the mother of four children (one son and three daughters). María is a member of FINCA Peru and earns her living by selling clothes, shoes, and wool from her store. She says that thanks to FINCA Peru she has learned how to save, which has helped her to get through difficult moments. Whenever there was an urgent situation, she had available funds saved up that could help her. Her dream for the future is to buy a house in the capital where her children currently study so that she can live near them.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of merchandise for her business such as clothing for women, men, and children. She will also buy shoes, slippers, and different types of wool.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, slippers, and different types of wool.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en: Heba is a 23-year-old married woman who supports one family member. She is from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for improvements to her home. In the future she hopes to increase the social and economic status of her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Ramon Antonio

texts.es:
En  el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Agrupación 24 De Mayo. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive Don Ramón, tiene  47 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, dos mayores y una de 5 años que estudia en escuela y es la única que aun vive con ellos. Su mujer es comerciante.
 
Nuestro amigo para ganarse la vida y para que no le falte nada a su familia se dedica al comercio al igual que su mujer, mientras que él vende queso en un pequeño local en el mercado local su esposa vende caramelos y dulces en las afueras de un colegio de la localidad, nos cuenta que es la única forma que tienen para poder salir adelante, él trabaja de jueves a domingo ya que es cuando mas ventas realiza mientras que su mujer trabaja en las mañanas de lunes a viernes , él lleva más de 8 años en este negocio.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar quesos, dulces y golosinas para el negocio de la mujer. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace dos ciclos   y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los  créditos. 

Su sueño es seguir adelante en su negocio y que este crezca.
texts.en:
The members of Agrupación 24 De Mayo Communal Bank meet every 15 days in Rocafuerte canton. This place is known for the delicious sweets its inhabitants prepare, which are appreciated throughout the country.

Don Ramón lives here. He is 47 years old and lives with his common-law partner with whom he has three children, two of whom are now adults and a daughter, 5, who is in school and the only one who still lives with them. His wife is a trader.

Our friend earns his living so that his family has all it needs, as a trader, just like his wife. While he sells cheese at a small stall in the local market, his wife sells candy and sweets outside a school in the town. Don Ramón tells us that this is their only means of getting ahead. He works from Thursday to Sunday because that is when he makes most of his sales and his wife works from Monday to Friday, during the mornings. He has had his business for more than 8 years.

He will use the loan to purchase cheese and sweets and candy for his wife. He has been in his communal bank through two loan cycles and he likes it because of the help he gets through loans.

His dream is that his business will expand and that he will continue moving ahead.

loans.use: to purchase cheese, sweets and candy.

loans.name: Mira  (Gualaceo) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mira está formado por 7 socias quienes viven por la parroquia de Zhidmad, pero se reunión en las oficinas de la fundación, la parroquia de Zhidmad está ubicada en la provincia del Azuay cantón Gualaceo, se encuentra ubicada a (22 km) de la ciudad de Cuenca y está conformada por 8 comunidades, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, agricultura y comercio, muchos laboran diariamente en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades. Nuestras socias son mujeres amable, gentiles, trabajadoras quienes diariamente  luchan para mejorar su estabilidad económica y asi sacar adelante a sus familias, su mayor orgullo es aun conservar su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Rosa Aurelia, tiene 37 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 18, 14, 12 y 8 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja y ayuda económicamente, dos de sus hijas estudian en el colegio y su ultima hija estudia en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo labora como jornalero, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Rosa Aurelia se dedica a las actividades del campo, cría ganado, caballos, cerdos, cuyes a los mismos que los venden cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica. También labora en la agricultura y lo que produce es para el consumo de su hogar, este trabajo le permite pasar en casa sin descuidar su hogar.
 
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
The “Mira” communal bank has 7 members who live in Zhidmad Parish but meet in the Fundación’s offices.  Zhidmad Parish is located in Azuay Province, Gualaceo Canton and is located 22 kilometers from the city of Cuenca and is composed of 8 communities.  Its residents raise animals, work in agriculture and in commerce.  Many work daily at various jobs in the city.  The members are nice, kind people who work daily striving to improve their economic stability and move their families forward.  Their greatest source of pride is that they still maintain the culture and tradition of their ancestors.

One of this group’s members is Rosa Aurelia, 37.  She’s married and has four children who are 18, 14, 12 and 8 years of age.  Her oldest son works and helps her economically.  Two of her daughters attend secondary school and her youngest daughter attends the local elementary school.  Her husband works as a day laborer and she owns the house she lives in.

Rosa Aurelia works in the fields; she raises cattle, horses, pigs and guinea pigs that she sells whenever she has economic need.  She also works in agriculture and what she produces is for home consumption.  This work allows her to stay home and not neglect her home.

She will use her loan money to buy manure and animal feed.  Her goal is to make some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy manure and animal feed.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo, esta casado y tiene tres hijos, vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz.
El actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de chamarras para diferentes entidades y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de educación, alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de tela, forros, cierres, para continuar con su trabajo de  confección de chamarras, pues desea aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Leonardo es adquirir una casa en anticrético ya que desea dar más seguridad y comodidad a su familia.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Leonardo is married and has three children. He lives at his parents’ house where he and his family occupy one room that consists of brick walls and a dirt floor. The house is located in the District of Tacagua in the city of La Paz.

Leonardo currently manufactures jackets for different organizations. With the little that he earns, he is able to pay for expenses such as education, food, and basic services for his family. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy fabric, lining, and zippers so that he can continue his work of producing jackets. Leonardo wants to increase his income so that he can improve his quality of life.

His dream is to acquire a house through an “anticrético” contract so that he can provide his family with greater security and comfort. This is the second time he has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, lining, zippers, and other materials for producing jackets.

loans.name: Awsaf

texts.en:
Since Awsaf is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan. Awsaf prefers that her photo is not on the internet; the above photo is of her husband. 

Awsaf is a 22-year-old, married woman from Sahab, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to pay her university tution so that she can continue her education. She is working on obtaining her master's degree and hopes to pursue a doctorate degree in the future. She says she always strives to increase her social awareness.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Samuel Victor

texts.es:
El joven Samuel Victor  esta soltero, tiene 24 años de edad, esta graduado de perito contador, se dedica a la asesoría de ventas, lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de una motocicleta, ya que su trabajo lo necesita y así puede ser mas productivo en las ventas que realiza, ya que se dedica como agente de ventas en una microfinanzas.
texts.en:
Samuel Victor is a single young man who is 24 years of age. He graduated with an accounting degree and currently works as a sales associate. Samuel has six years of experience.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy a motorcycle that he needs for his work. This will help him become more productive in making sales since he works as an associate in the microfinance field.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle for use in his sales job.

loans.name: El Cruce Hacia El Futuro  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal El Cruce hacia el Futuro, está formado por 12 socias quienes viven en la parroquia de Sinicay que está ubicado al noroeste de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta parroquia tiene varios lugares para visitar, sus habitantes se dedican a la cría de animales, agricultura y también se dedican al comercio. Nuestra socias son mujeres emprendedoras que siempre están buscando los medios para mejorar su economía y sacar adelante a sus familias, se sienten muy orgullosas de  mantener la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mónica Jesenia, tiene 34 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 17 y 14 años de edad que estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo se de dedica al comercio de varios productos, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Mónica Jesenia se dedica a  la atención de su tienda, actividad que la desempeña desde hace 4 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, también se da el tiempo para cuidar de su familia. 

Es socia del  banco comunal hace 15 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para seguir surtiendo su tienda.

Sus metas son crecer más en su tienda y tener un bazar y papelería.
texts.en:
The “El Cruce Hacia el Futuro” (Crossroad to the Future) communal bank has 12 members who live in Sinicay Parish located northeast of the city of Cuenca.  This parish has many places to visit.  Its residents raise animals, farm and also work in commerce.  The members are enterprising women who are always looking for ways to improve their economy and move their families forward.  They feel very proud for still preserving the native culture and traditions.

One of this group’s members is Mónica Jesenia, 34.  She’s married and has two children who are 17 and 14 years old and are attending a local secondary school.  Her husband is a merchant selling various products and they own the house they live in.

Mónica Jesenia works tending to her store, an activity she’s had for four years.  She works Sunday through Sunday from 7am until 9pm and also finds time to care for her family.

She’s been a communal bank member for 15 years and will use her new loan to buy foodstuffs to continue stocking her store.  Her goal is to make her store grow more and to have a bazaar and stationery shop.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loans.name: Abdul- Fatah

texts.en: Abdul-Fatah is 28 years old and married.  He is from Sahab, Jordan. He is requesting a youth loan of 500 JOD, which he will use to buy furniture for his home. In the future, he is planning to add another floor to his home.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Berdi

texts.ru: Берди житель города Истаравшан. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Берди зарабатывает путем разведения крупного рогатого скота. В этом ему помогает жена. Животноводством Берди занимается уже 12 лет. Он берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Berdi is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 41 years old, married and has five children.  Berdi earns a living by breeding cattle.  His wife helps him with this business.  Berdi has been involved in animal husbandry for 12 years.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es:
En  el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Agrupación 24 De Mayo. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosario, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos todos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es chofer y trabaja en el municipio local.

Nuestra amiga para ganar algo por su cuenta sin salir de su casa hace varios años construyo en su casa un pequeño galpón en el cual se dedico a la cría de pollos, ella compra los pollos cuando están pequeños en un local en el centro de la ciudad para luego mantenerlos por tres meses tiempo adecuado para que tengan un buen desarrollo para luego  venderlos ya sea por libras o en pie a comerciantes y personas de la localidad.
 
Este crédito es para  comprar pollos alimento y medicinas para los mismos para que tengan un buen desarrollo. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y sin tantos requisitos.
 
Sus sueños son comprar un carro y arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
The members of Agrupación 24 De Mayo Communal Bank meet every 15 days in Rocafuerte canton. This place is known for the delicious sweets its inhabitants prepare, which are appreciated throughout the country.

We meet Sra. Rosario here. She is 57 years old, married and has five children, all now adults and one of whom still lives with her. Her husband is a driver and works for the local government.

Our friend, in order to earn something on her own without having to leave her house, built a small shed a few years ago where she raises chickens. She purchases the chicks at a shop downtown in the city and then cares for them for three months, sufficient time for them to grow nicely, and then sells them either by the pound or live to merchants and individuals in the town.

This loan is to purchase chickens and feed and medicine for them so they grow well. She has been a member of her communal bank since its inception and enjoys it because the loans are quick and do not have so many requirements.

Her dreams are to buy a car and fix up her house.

loans.use: to buy chickens as well as feed and medicine for them.

loans.name: Murodbek

texts.ru:
Муродбек 25-летний мужчина проживающий в городе Истаравшан. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Жена Муродбека домохозяйка. Сам Муродбек более десяти лет занимается торговлей. Раньше он арендовал торговую точку на рынке, где занимался торговлей продуктов. 
На сегодняшний день Муродбек имеет собственный небольшой магазин, где продает хозяйственные товары и продукты питания. Он просит кредит для покупки конфет, сахара, сгущенного молока, сливочного масла, кондитерских и хлебобулочных изделий, а также для приобретения холодильника.
texts.en: Murodbek is a 25 year-old man living in the city of Istaravshan.  He is married and has one child.  Murodbek's wife is a homemaker.  Murodbek has been involved in sales for over ten years.  He previously leased a retail outlet at market, where he sold food products.  Today, he owns a small store, where he sells household goods and food products.  Murodbek is requesting this loan to purchase candy, sugar, condensed milk, butter, confectionery and bakery goods, and also to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to purchase candy, sugar, condensed milk, butter, confectionery and bakery goods, and also to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is 29 years old, married, and has two family members.  She is from Jubeiha, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a youth loan of 500 JOD, which she will use to purchase clothes and blankets to sell. In the future she wants to expand her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and blankets to sell.

loans.name: Naifeh

texts.en:
Naifeh is 54 years old, married, and has two family members.  She is from Sahab, Jordan. She is requesting a loan for 600 JOD, which she will use to buy  blankets to sell to her friends and neighbors. In the future she would like to expand her business and increase her income.

Naifeh prefers not to display her photo on the Internet; her son is in the above photo.

loans.use: to purchase for blankets to sell.

loans.name: Oltin

texts.ru:
Олтин родился 1988 году в Истаравшане. Он добрый и трудолюбивый молодой человек. Олтин женат. Живет вместе с родителями. Родители Олтина занимаются растениеводством. Его жена домохозяйка. 
Олтин более семи лет работает в пекарне. На сегодняшний день Олтин имеет собственную пекарню, где занимается выпечкой лепешек для торговли. Олтин хочет получить кредит для покупки муки и дров.
texts.en: Oltin was born in 1988 in the city of Istaravshan.  He is a kind and hardworking young person.  Oltin is married and lives together with his parents.  His parents are involved in agriculture.  His wife is a homemaker.  Oltin has been working at a bakery for over seven years.  Today, he owns a bakery, where he makes flatbread for sale.  Oltin wants to obtain this loan to purchase flour and wood.

loans.use: to purchase flour and wood

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр житель города Куляб. Возраст, 39 лет. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Бахтиёр работает таксистом. В этой области он один год. Бахтиёр просит кредит для установки оборудования для природного газа и покупки баллонов.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is a resident of the city of Kulob.  He is 39 years old, married and has three children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Bakhtiyor works as a taxi driver.  He has been in this business for one year.  Bakhtiyor is requesting this loan to install a natural gas equipment and purchase gas containers.

loans.use: to install a natural gas equipment and purchase gas containers

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Revendeuse de trousseaux bébé, habits, couches au marché à toutes personnes et cela depuis 2003, Madame Abla est à son quatrième crédit dans notre institution. Avec ce prêt, elle s’approvisionnera en habits, couches pour bébé et trousseau pour bébé. Elle veut agrandir l’activité et assurer le bien être de la famille. Notons qu’elle est âgée de 37ans, mère de 02 enfants (08 et 04ans) dont 01 seul à l’école et mariée à un blanchisseur.
texts.en: Mrs. Abla has been selling baby accessories, clothing and diapers at the market to the public at large since 2003. She is on her fourth loan with our institution. With this loan, she is going to stock up on baby clothing, diapers and accessories. She would like to expand her business and provide for the well-being of her family. We should note that she is 37 years old and has two children (eight and four years of age), one of whom is in school, and married to a laundry worker.

loans.use: to buy baby clothing, diapers, accessories etc.

loans.name: Shahrikhon

texts.ru: Шахрихон проживает в Яванском районе. Ей 44 года. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Шахрихон занимается купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота. Этот вид бизнеса является семейным бизнесом для Шахрихон. Животноводством Шахрихон занимается уже пять лет. Она разводит скот у себя дома. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Shahrikhon lives in the Yavan district.  She is 44 years old, married and has five children.  Shahrikhon is involved in buying and selling cattle.  This is a family business for Shahrikhon.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for five years.  She breeds livestock at home.  Shahrikhon is requesting this loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Roze Group

texts.en:
This group is called Roze and consists of Roza, Saidh, Fatima and Hakmh who live in Sana`a, Yemen.

Fatima is 38 years old and lives in Sana`a, Yemen with her family. She is married and she has four children, who attend public school. Her educational background is a bachelor's degree. She is hardworking and knows well how she can manage between her studying and her children's care. She applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy a washing machine for her house.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for her house.

loans.name: Al-Aihm Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Aihm and consists of three women: Amnh, Hya, Afrah and one man, Hashid, who are all hardworking. They live in Taiz, Yemen. They took a loan of 180,000 YER.

 Afrah is 40 years old and a loving mother of six children. She has tried to work hard. She has a strong determination to improve her standard of living. Due to the high cost of commodities, she has requested a loan of 50,000 YER to buy bedroom supplies like blankets, cushions, etc. In the future, she hopes to have a big house as her home.

loans.use: to buy bedroom supplies like blankets, cushions, etc. for her house

loans.name: Al-Khla Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-khla and consists of six members Faniah, Fatima, Hana, Taysir, Fatima and Wafa. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. They took out a loan of 230,000 YER.

Faniah is 45 years old, married and has seven young children. Almost of them attend school. She lives in Sana`a, Yemen.  She has owned a house for many years. Her husband immigrated to KSA and on coming back home invested his money in building a house.

She is applying for a loan of 40,000 YER through AMB to purchase doors for her house.

loans.use: to purchase doors for her house.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia, a 57-year-old widow and responsible mother, works hard everyday to uplift her five children from poor living conditions. To make a living, she is engaged in a direct-selling business, usually earning a net profit of PHP 2,500 a month.

Nelia is now requesting a loan of PHP 45,000 to buy lotion, cologne, perfume, shoes and lipstick to offer to her customers. She hopes that she can get the amount requested to develop her business.

loans.use: to buy lotion, cologne, perfume, shoes and lipstick to offer to her customers.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 28 years old and is married to Leonard. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with two children. 

Judith is engaged in a direct sales business, which she has had for four years. She is aiming to increase her product offerings to satisfy customer demand, but her income is insufficient. Thus, she is asking for a loan of 20,000 Philippines pesos. She will use the loan to buy lotion, cologne, lipstick, shoes and t-shirts to sell. She believes that her sacrifices will help her to reach her goal, which is to increase her profits and to save for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy lotion, cologne, lipstick, shoes and t-shirts to sell

loans.name: Deo

texts.en: Deo is a forty year-old man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has been dealing in the local brew business for 15 years, and the business has been lucrative.  Price fluctuations and inadequate capital are affecting the growth of his business.  He dreams of building a permanent home and educating his 8 children, while his business dream is to be able expand his product to the city where there is a ready market.  Deo wants a loan to buy local brew to sell.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Vigilia

texts.en:
Vigilia is 47 years old and is widowed. To make a living, Vigilia has operated her rolling store business for 10 years. She also earns an income from vegetables and snacks. She earns about P500 daily by patiently operating her business. 

Vigilia wants to expand her venture, and that’s why she is taking out this loan amounting to P12,000 to purchase native cakes, fish, meat and peanuts to sell in their local community. She hopes to further grow her business to secure her children's future. Despite the hardships of life, she strives hard to earn and save for family progress.

loans.use: to purchase native cakes, fish, meat and peanuts to sell in their local community

loans.name: Dan

texts.en: Dan is a thirty-six-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children and building a permanent home. He has been a farmer for the last ten years and his main hardships are seasonal weather, price fluctuation and inflation. He has a vision of hiring employees to help expand his farming activities and venturing into new markets for his yields. Dan needs a loan to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a thirty-eight-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children and build a permanent home. He has been a farmer for the last two years, and his main hardships are customers not paying on time, seasonal weather and inadequate capital to buy stock. He has a vision of expanding his business to new markets. Stephen needs a loan to  purchase beans, maize flour and rice to sell.

loans.use: to purchase beans, maize flour  and rice to sell.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a forty-five-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children up to the university. He has been a farmer for the last twenty years and his main hardship is price fluctuation, inflation and seasonal weather changes. He has a vision of expanding his business to new markets and venturing into mechanized agriculture. Francis needs a loan to buy fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a twenty-seven-year-old man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children up to the university. He has been running a retail shop for ten years and his main hardship is inadequate capital to buy enough stock. He has a vision of moving his business to new markets and owning a wholesale shop. Joseph needs a loan to  buy general merchandise such as salt and oils to sell.

loans.use: to purchase general merchandise such as salt and oils to sell.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en: Dolores is 43 years old, and is married to Elpidio. Dolores wanted to lift up her status of living, so she decided to work hard and earn income. Dolores patiently provides motorcycle transport services to the people in their village. Right now, she is asking for a loan of P15,000 to buy tires and spare parts to use on her motorcycle and ensure the safety of passengers and her life as well. She hopes that someday she can strengthen the business and keep earning good income from it.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts to use on her motorcycle

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a 35-year-old married man with three children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children. 

He has been running a retail shop for the past four years, which he started with his personal savings. His hardships include price fluctuation and inflation, however, he has a vision of expanding his business to new markets. Paul needs a loan to buy sugar, cassava flour, maize flour, water and millet flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cassava flour, maize flour, water and millet flour for resale.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 30-year-old woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. Her personal goal is to educate her children to attain degrees.

She has been operating a retail shop for three years, and her main hardships are price fluctuations and inflation, seasonal weather and inadequate capital to buy stock.

However, she has a vision of hiring employees to help grow her business and expanding her business to new markets. Sarah needs a loan to buy sugar, maize flour, soap and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, posho, soap and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en: Nelson is 29 years old and living in Masindi, Uganda, and he is charged with the responsibility of looking after his two children.  He has been selling clothes for 6 years.  He started the business with his savings from his wages earned while working as a shop attendant.  Inadequate capital is his major challenge and his dreams are to educate his children and to expand his business into new markets.  Nelson needs a loan to buy more clothes to resell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is 32 years old and married with two children. They live in Hioma, Uganda. He has been trading in produce for six years.

He faces challenges of seasonal weather variations and price fluctuations. He hopes to build a permanent house for his family and to educate his children. He wishes to expand his business to new markets and own a big food store in town. Martin intends to use the loan to purchase maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to purchase maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Mugusu Twimuke Tukole Group

texts.en:
The goals of Selle, a 64-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda, are to build a permanent home and educate his children. He has been operating a retail shop for the last eight years, and customers not paying on time are his main hardship.

Selle is now requesting a loan to purchase sugar, salt and soap for resale. He aspires to expand his business into new markets and buy land to grow crops. He is part of Mugusu Twimuke Tukole Group, where each member guarantees the loan repayment of the others.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and soap to resell.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a 28-year-old man with three children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children up to the university.

He has been dealing in phone repairs and sales for 11 years. He started with 500,000 shillings but now has 3,500,000 shillings as working capital. His main hardship is high taxes. However, he has a vision of buying land to grow crops to increase his income sources and to expand his business to new markets. He needs a loan to buy phones to sell.

loans.use: to buy phones to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labor

loans.name: Farhat

texts.en:
Ms. Farhat has faced much hardship in her life. The family of seven members was well-off before the loss her husband had in his business. It made them spend a lower middle class life. 

Ms. Farhat never lost hope and continues to strive for betterment. She always encourages her husband. Also, to support him financially, she opened a small beauty parlor in her home, as her daughter was a beautician.

Now that they have five years of experience in this field, they are now willing to expand their business with the help of Kashf Foundation. So they requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase more related items and a hair dryer.

Both the mother and daughter are very optimistic and are looking forward to further enhancement of their business.

loans.use: to purchase a hair dryer and related materials for her beauty parlor.

loans.name: Shirali

texts.ru: Ширали родился 1960 году в районе Кубодиен. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Ширали имеет среднее образование. Он уже три года как занимается животноводством. Ширали в основном разводит мелко - рогатый скот. Он просит кредит для закупа коз.
texts.en: Shirali was born in 1960 in the Qubadiyon district.  He is married and has five children.  Shirali has a secondary education.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for three years.  Shirali primarily breeds small livestock.  He is requesting this loan to buy goats.

loans.use: to buy goats

loans.name: Víctor William

texts.es:
Víctor se encuentra casado y tiene 1 hijo, y para generar los ingresos de su hogar tiene su negocio de cría de cerdos con el cual puede brindarle a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Anteriormente tenían grandes dificultades económicas, pero con mucho esfuerzo logró sacar su negocio adelante y poder tener cada vez más cerdos para la venta; esto hizo que los clientes del municipio fueran creciendo cada vez más y pudiera tener más pedidos. Actualmente tiene grandes pedidos y su capacidad de producción no puede responder a todos, es por esto que Víctor busca un préstamo para comprar 3 cerdos y así poder aumentar su capacidad de producción para responder a todos los pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es crecer con su negocio y que este le permita seguir generando los ingresos con los que sostiene su hogar.
texts.en:
Víctor is married and has one child. He has a pig breeding business to make an income for his household, with which he can provide a good quality of life for his family. 

Before, they had great financial difficulties but with immense efforts he succeeded in getting ahead with his business and increasing the number of pigs for sale. That is why his customers from the community increased over time and he has higher demand. Currently, he has many requests but he does not have the capacity to meet them all. 

Because of that Victor is asking for this loan to buy three more pigs. This way he will be able to increase his production capacity to meet all of his customers’ demands. 

His biggest dream is to grow with his business and that this will allow him to continue to earn the income to support his household.

loans.use: to buy three pigs so as to be able to increase his production capacity to meet all customers’ demands.

loans.name: Abdusattor

texts.ru: Абдусаттор житель района Фархор. Ему 45 лет. Он женат. У нее трое детей. Абдусаттор уже три года занимается скотоводством. Он разводит скот у себя дома. Абдусаттор берет кредит для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Abdusattor is a resident of the Farkhor district.  He is 45 years old, married and has three children.  Abdusattor has been involved in animal husbandry for three years.  He breeds livestock at home.  Abdusattor is requesting this loan to buy bulls and calves.

loans.use: to buy bulls and calves

loans.name: Améyovi

texts.fr: Madame Améyovi est mère de famille. Elle a 02 enfants dont 01 à l’école. Le premier a 21ans et le dernier 18ans. Elle est âgée de 49ans et son conjoint est gérant d’un hôtel de la place. Elle est revendeuse de nourriture   depuis 1999, activité qui lui rapporte comme elle le souhaite. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et elle vend à domicile. Elle veut voir sa famille s’épanouir et faire croitre son chiffre d’affaire.
texts.en: Ms. Améyovi is a mother with a family. She has two children, of whom one is in school. The first child is 21 years old, and the last is 18. Ms. Améyovi is 49 years old and her husband is the manager of a local hotel. She has been a food retailer since 1999. It's a business that earns what she would wish. She gets her supplies in Lomé, and she sells out of her home. She wants to see her family thrive and to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy grocery items

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Чамшед предоставляет услугу. Он работает таксистом. Чамшед уже три года занимается этим видом деятельности. В основном он развозит пассажиров по маршруту Хамадони-Куляб. Чамшед берет кредит для ремонта автомашины.
texts.en: Jamshed lives in the Hamadoni district.  He is 34 years old, married and has two children.  Jamshed provides a service.  He works as a taxi driver.  Jamshed has been involved in this business for three years.  He primarily transports passengers along the Hamadoni-Kulob route.  Jamshed is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase computers.

loans.name: Elizabeth Manuela

texts.es:
Elizabeth es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 51 años de edad, es casada y madre de 6 hijos.
Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 7 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de gelatina, chupetes, chicha y varias golosinas. Manuela empezó a trabajar con FINCA Perú a través de la recomendación de su amiga  y ahora gracias a la institución aprendió a ahorrar, ser puntual y responsable. Su sueño para el futuro es brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos, ella desea que todos sus hijos tengan una educación universitaria y que sean profesionales. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de varios ingredientes para la preparación de sus productos como gelatina, cucharas y vasos de plástico, aceite, azúcar, maíz, etc.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Gaviotas” (The Seagulls). She is 51 years old, married, and the mother of six children.

Elizabeth has been a member of FINCA Peru for seven years. She earns her living by selling gelatin, popsicles, “chicha” (a traditional beverage made from corn), and various sweets. Elizabeth Manuela began working with FINCA Peru based on the recommendation of a friend. Thanks to FINCA she has learned how to save and to be punctual and responsible. Her dream for the future is to provide a good education for her children. She wants all of her children to have a university education and become professionals.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in various ingredients and supplies for preparing her products such as gelatin, spoons, plastic cups, oil, sugar, corn, and other items.

loans.use: to buy gelatin, spoons, plastic cups, oil, sugar, corn, and other items.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora  Natalia, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Nuestra socia  se sigue dedicando a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes,  Natalia trabaja en este comercio hace algún tiempo y es con esta actividad que ha podido apoyarse económicamente y mantenerse. La socia en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para capitalizar su tienda y comprará mercadería como azúcar, arroz, leche, fideos, galletas y bebidas gaseosas, todos estos productos para surtir su comercio.
Natalia quiere hacer crecer su actividad y ampliar su tienda de abarrotes para convertirla en un mini market para ofrecer mas y mejores productos a sus clientes.
Natalia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse y desarrollarse con su actividad.
texts.en:
This member is Sra. Natalia. She belongs to the Communal Bank “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” which is located in the city of Cusco, Peru. Natalia continues to sell basic necessity products from her grocery store. She has been working in this trade from some time and her business has enabled her to support herself financially. Natalia is taking this opportunity to invest her loan as capital for her store so that she can buy merchandise such as sugar, rice, milk, noodles, cookies, and carbonated beverages. All of these products will be used to restock her business.

Natalia wants to grow her business and expand her grocery store by converting it into a mini-market where she can offer more and better products to her customers. She is extremely grateful to Kiva for helping her maintain and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, milk, noodles, cookies, and carbonated beverages.

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru:
Далер родился 1990 году в Исфаре. Он милый и добрый молодой человек. Далер на протяжении двух лет работает мастером по сборки мебели в мебельном салоне. На сегодняшний день он хочет открыть свой собственный мебельный салон.
