Actualmente ella labora para el INTA desempeñandose como secretaria por mas de 8 años.  Cabe señalar que en su barrio es conocida por ser muy trabajadora y responsble.
texts.en:
Belkys is a young woman who wishes to improve the infrastructure of part of the kitchen at her mother’s house.  That is why she is requesting the support, in order to be able to do that and improve the family’s quality of life.

She has been working for INTA [Nicaraguan Institute for Agricultural Technology] as a secretary for over eight years.  It should be noted that she is known in her neighborhood for being very hard-working and responsible.

loans.use: to improve the kitchen.

loans.name: Satta

texts.en:
Satta is 31 years old, single and lives in Kakata Town. She has three children with two at school and one small baby. They live at home with her. She stopped her education in the 9th grade.

For the past fifteen years, she has been selling rice in a little shop. She established the business with a loan from her father. She encounters few problems in her business other than sometimes her customers do not have enough money, so they buy on credit. She is requesting a loan to buy more rice for her business. She enjoys the independence her income gives her.

loans.use: to buy more rice for her business

loans.name: Elvis Manuel

texts.es: Elvis labora para la Institucion del INTA como asistente administrativo desde hace varios años, solicita su primer credito ya que desea mejorar la infraestructura de la cocina pues actualmente es de madera, y quiere mejorar la calidad de vida junto con la familia. En su trabajo es reconocido por su responsabilidad y deseos de superacion personal y labaoral.
texts.en:
Elvis has been working for INTA [Nicaraguan Institute for Agricultural Technology] as an administrative assistant for several years.  

He is requesting his first loan because he wishes to improve the infrastructure of the kitchen.  It is currently made of wood, and he wishes to improve the family’s quality of life.

At his work he is known for being responsible and his desire to improve personally and in his work.

loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie is 32 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is single, and she has three children between the ages of 7 and 11. They are in school and live at home.   She did not go to school. 

For the past five years, she has been selling dried meat from a table in the market. She focuses on bush meat.  She established the business with a loan from her mother. A problem she faces is the distance to buy the dried meat wholesale. She enjoys the independence her income gives her. She is requesting a loan to buy more dried meat for her business. Her dear wish is to have a provisions shop in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more dried meat for her business.

loans.name: Sando

texts.en:
Sando is 27 years old, single, and live in Kakata Town.  She has two children, both aged 10, that are in school and live at home.   She stopped her education in 5th grade.

For the past seven years, she has been selling used clothes in the market. She focuses on children’s clothes.  She established the business with a loan from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. She enjoys the independence her income gives her. Her plans are to build a shop and a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie  lives in Kakata Town. She is 36 years old, married, and has six  children between 5 to 17 years old that are in school and live at home. She did not go to school. 

For the past 2  years, she has been  selling palm oil in the local market. She started this business with help from her husband and learned this way of selling from her friends. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. She enjoys her business because of the profit she receives every day. Her  plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business

loans.name: Basma

texts.en:
Basma, 48 years old and widowed, is caring for seven sons and daughters.

Being an illiterate woman has limited her chances in getting a job to support the family, and for that reason she opened her own business which is a food products store. 

She has applied for this loan to bring in more food products and other goods for the store.

loans.use: to bring in more food products and other goods for the store.

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal, 40 years old and a single lady, has a sister and a brother.

Manal is an artistic lady who loves to draw, make crafts, color clay pots and such. Shown in the photo is some of her work. She has a shop for selling her art, and she participates in local exhibitions and fairs.

Manal has applied for this loan to increase her productivity and start working on marketing her art outside Jordan whether to sell online or participate in international exhibitions.

loans.use: to increase her productivity and start working on the marketing side

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 40 years old. She and her husband live at Gardnersville. She  has  seven  children  between the ages of 21 and 32  years. Her children are not in school due to lack of financial support; one of them  is working. Her husband  also works at a  laundry. He gave her the initial   capital to start  in this business. 

She has been selling cooking oil , palm nuts  and charcoal  for   the  past  four years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more  charcoal, palm-nuts and cooking   oil  for  her  business.   Her future plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal, palm-nuts and cooking   oil  for  her  business.

loans.name: Maitta

texts.en:
Maitta is 35 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 to 15; all of them attend school.

For the past ten years Maitta has been selling used clothes. She makes a lot of profit. The rainy season is the problem that she faces. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. She plans to build a house for her children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda, 38 years old and a conservative woman, asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Huda and her husband have an animal sales business, mainly sheep and goats. From that business and her husband's other job they are managing to support their two kids. 

Now Huda has applied for this loan to buy more goats in preparation for the upcoming holidays.

loans.use: to buy more goats

loans.name: Kemah

texts.en: Kemah is 44 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She’s single and has three children that  live at home and are in school. In 2010 Kamah started selling used clothes. What she actually loves about this business is that she’s self-employed. She’s requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes to sell in the local market. She hopes to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes to sell in the local market

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad, who appears in the picture, is a 21-year-old single young man. He works in agriculture with the rest of his family members, and he wants to contribute to the purchase of olive and almond seedlings. He is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to provide a share of the family's costs of purchasing the seedlings. It will allow them to produce a better crop and thus increase their sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase olive and almond seedlings

loans.name: Ghazia

texts.en:
Ghazia, 56 years old and a married woman, is a mother to four children, living in a rented home.

Ghazia does an embroidery and sewing business at home. She is specialized in making the traditional men's head cover that is now also used as a scarf for both genders. She has applied for this loan to buy a new sewing machine to expand her business so she can participate in special exhibitions related to sewing and to traditions.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To repair his pickup

loans.name: Joheydi Lilliette

texts.es: Joheydi trabaja para el Inta Cede El Recreo desde hace varios años, se desempeña como administradora, es soltera y actualmente estudia otra carrera, pues desea incrementar sus conocimientos y posibilidades de trabajo en el futuro. Solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de Construir un pozo artesanal y asi tener agua en su casa, ya que el problema del agua es muy frecuente en su comunidad.  Espera poder seguir teniendo la oportunidad de mejorar la condiciones de vida de su familia con otro credito mejorando la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en: Joheydi has worked for INTA [Nicaraguan Institute for Agricultural Technology] in the El Recreo offices for a number of years.  She works as an administrator.  She is single and is currently studying for another career, as she wants to expand her knowledge and future work opportunities.  She is requesting her first loan with the goal of building an artesian well so that she can have water in her house, because water problems are very common in her community.  She hopes to be able to continue to have opportunities to improve her family's living conditions; with another loan she would like to make improvements to the infrastructure of her house.

loans.use: to build an artesian well

loans.name: Alexander Ulises

texts.es: El Joven Alexander tiene buen deseo de superacion y mejorar su calidad de vida, es por eso que solicita el financiamiento para porder completar la compra de una Computadora y mejorar su desempeño ya que le es muy util el tener una, pues avanzaria y entregaria mas rapido sus informes y tareas de la universidad.
texts.en: Alexander is a youth who has a strong desire to succeed and to improve his quality of life.  To do this, he is requesting a loan so that he can gather together enough money to buy a computer and improve his performance in school.  It is very useful to have one, because he could do his work faster and deliver his papers and homework more rapidly to the university.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Shama

texts.en:
Ms. Shama is a widow lady who has two daughters. It’s been ten years since her husband passed away. 

Initially, she was working in a garment factory to provide financial support to her family, but for the last two years she has been running a small general store. 

With the upward trend of inflation and the increasing financial needs of her family, she wants to expand her business. Ms. Shama is in her first loan cycle with Kashf Foundation and requested a loan amount of Rs. 25,000.

This amount can help her to give her family an improved quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her general store.

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Ms. Salma is a 33-year-old lady. She is married and the mother of five children. She never hesitated to work and is willing to support her family. 

She started selling and purchasing animals. She buys animals (kids/baby goats) at low prices, brings them up, and sells them at higher prices.

Along with her household activities, she also manages to continue this business. Now it’s been four years for her in this business, and she is in her second loan cycle with Kashf Foundation.

Ms. Salma is currently in need of Rs. 20,000 to keep her business going.

loans.use: to purchase animals for onward selling.

loans.name: Randa

texts.en:
Randa is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Ehlaiel appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Randa is a 38-year-old married woman who is a mother to four sons and two daughters. Her husband is employed and earns a small salary that is not enough to cover the family's needs and costs. Randa wants to improve her family's home living conditions, so she is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing new living room furniture in order to improve the living conditions in her house. Taking this loan will offer Randa and her family comfortable furniture so they can enjoy living in their house.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es: La Sra. Ramona trabaja para el INTA-CDT hace muchos años, lo cual le a permitido poco a poco mejor la calidad de su vida, actualmente solicita el financiamiento para hacer una mejor en su casa de habitacion y tener mejores condiciones para vivir, pues la casita esta en mal estado y desea reparar la pared y el techo.  Sueña con ir poco a poco mejorando su vivienda para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ramona has worked for INTA-CDT [Nicaraguan Institute for Agricultural Technology] for many years, and this has allowed her to gradually improve her quality of life.  She is requesting a loan now to make an improvement to her house so that she will have better living conditions, as the home is in bad condition and she wants to repair the walls and the roof.  She dreams of gradually improving her home to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs to her house

loans.name: Thelma Maria

texts.es: Thelma Maria  tiene 13 años  de trabajar como docente  de secundaria para el ministerio de Educacion,   este financiamiento lo requiere para construir dos paredes de esta manera tener mejores condiciones en su hogar y darle mas valor a la  propiedad, segun sus compañeros de trabajo es bien responsable, honesto y muy trabajadora, ella cuenta con la ayuda compañero de vida ambos son asalariados.  su mayor sueño en la vida es que sus hijas crezcan sana y que no le falte lo basico en el hogar y poseer estabilidad laboral
texts.en: Thelma Maria has worked for 13 years for the Ministry of Education as a high school teacher.  She needs this loan to build two walls in order to have better conditions in her home and increase its value.  According to her work colleagues, she is responsible, honest and very hardworking.  Thelma Maria is helped by her life partner, who is also a salaried worker.  Her main dreams in life are to see her children grow up healthy, to always have basic necessities in her home, and to have job stability.

loans.use: to build walls in her home

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Bilal appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Mona is a 22-year-old married woman. She and her husband Bilal have no children yet. For the past two years, Mona's husband has had a stationery store, which is located near many schools in the area. His business is profitable, but it also needs more support to cover its costs. Mona wants to share the responsibilities for improving the family's income, so she is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing a new collection of stationery. This will increase sales and improve the family's income to live in better conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a new collection of stationery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a kitchen roof.

loans.name: Dhuniya Devi

texts.en:
Dhuniya is 25 years old and has six children. She is married to Ramdev, who makes bamboo-based products. 

To support their family, Dhuniya started a piggery business at home with just two pigs. She has gained a respected number of customers through friends and relatives in the past three years. 

She requires a loan to increase the number of pigs to meet the growing demand. In the future, she wants to further expand her piggery by purchasing more pigs, which will enable her to support the needs of her family.

loans.use: to pay for more pigs.

loans.name: Rambha Devi

texts.en:
Rambha is 31 years old, married, and has four sons. They live in a small village called Pachanpur in the Bara district of Nepal. 

Within their humble house, Rambha has set up a small grocery shop where she sells different types of products like rice, pulses (legumes), sugar, etc. She has proven her micro-entrepreneurial spirit by identifying that opportunity and taking action. 

As a result of the success of her shop, she feels it is time to make certain changes to it. In particular, she wants to make the shop bigger and offer a wider range of products. Hence, she is taking a loan of NPR 30,000 to carry out this expansion. Her hard work and ability to put ideas into practice have paid off with a good reputation within her community.

loans.use: To expand her grocery shop.

loans.name: Munaini

texts.en:
Munaini, 26 years old, is married and has three children, two of them in school. She works very hard to provide for her family. 

For the past three years, she has been selling different types of local vegetables near the market. Thanks to her experience, she currently has a lot of customers, which permits her to have good sales. She also knows where to go to get good vegetables at low prices in order to sell them later. 

She is looking for a loan in order to buy more vegetables and thus face the season with a good inventory. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: To expand her vegetable shop.

loans.name: Jose Abel

texts.es: Josè Abel de 33 años de edad, labora como docente de Formación profesional  desde hace 11 años años consecutivos,  es una profesor  bien trabajador y  muy  responsable, este crèdito lo  requiere para la instalacion de la energia electrica y la agua potable en su vivienda y de esta manera lograr instalarse en su nueva casita,  es bien dedicado a su trabajo y a su familia, su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia goze de mucha salud y gozar de estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
Jose Abel is 33 years old and has worked the past 11 years teaching professional training classes. He is a very hard-working and responsible teacher.

He needs this loan to set up electricity and potable water where he lives.  This way he will manage to  have it installed in his new house.  

He is very devoted to his work and to his family.  The greatest dream of his life is for his family to enjoy good health and work stability.

loans.use: to install electrical service.

loans.name: Hasibun

texts.en:
Hasibun is 25 years old and lives in the Pachangpur, Kalaiya (Bara district) of Nepal. She is married and has three children. 

She owns a sewing machine and tailors different types of clothes. She has a very good personal reputation within her community. Therefore, most of the women and girls come to her to tailor new clothes or mend and repair exiting clothes. 

She is requesting a loan of NPR 30,000 to buy different kinds of cloth to sew a variety of women's clothing such as blouses and skirts to sell. 

In the future, she hopes that her business will expand to support the needs of her family and to send her children to school.

loans.use: To buy cloth to prepare a variety of women's clothing to sell.

loans.name: Nagmati Devi

texts.en:
Nagmati is married and 42 years old, and she has one child. 

She started a food stall business two years ago. She has had a regular flow of customers to sustain her business. 

She is requesting a loan of NPR 30,000 to purchase some additional products such as soft drinks and spices to sell in the community. She earns almost NPR 7,000 through this business. 

Nagmati hopes that her business will expand to support the needs of her family in the future.

loans.use: To expand her food stall business.

loans.name: Meo

texts.en:
Meo is 51 years old. She is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province. Meo has raised animals since 2000, earning around $8 per day. Her husband is an animal food supplier who earns about $4 per day. Both of them are in the picture above. Each month, Meo has to spend about $50 on food, $5 on utility expenses and $10 on other expenses. 

Meo is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase more animal feed to sell to clients. This loan will help her family business become better and earn more profit. In the future, she hopes she can expand her business into a big business to support her standard of living and her children's higher education.

loans.use: to purchase more animal feed to sell to clients.

loans.name: Houy

texts.en:
Houy is 28 years old. She is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province. Houy has been a farmer since 1998, earning about $1 per day. Her husband has been a driver since 2011, earning around $5 per day. Both of them are in the picture above. 

Each month, Houy has to spend $28 on food, $5 on utility expenses and $30 on other expenses. Houy is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase a motorbike for her husband so he can drive to work. This loan will help her to reduce the cost of transportation. In the future, she hopes she can support her children's higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her husband so he can drive to work.

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Mostafa appears in her Kiva profile photo. He is pictured next to his taxi.

Rania is a 36-year-old, married woman who is mother to five sons and one daughter.

For the past four years, Rania's husband has been a taxi driver, which has been a profitable project. However, he needs more support to cover his costs.

Rania wants to help her husband increase the family's income, so she is requesting a $1,500 loan from FATEN to help her husband purchase a new taxi. This will enable Rania's husband to get his own taxi and work extra hours, which will improve the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase a new taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for roof and wall repairs.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie lives in Kakata. She is married and has three children, ages 3 to 12. The children are in school and live at home. 

For the past five years, Mamie has been selling rice by the cup at the local market. One of the main challenges she faces is that the price of rice is very  high. She says her business helps her to send her children to school and bring food in the home.  

Mamie is requesting a loan to purchase more bags of rice for her business. She plans to build her house and attend college in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of rice for her business.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 29 years old and lives in Kakata town. She and her boyfriend live together and have two children, aged 4 and 8, who are in school and live at home. For the past three years she has been selling dried fish in the local market.

One of the main problems she faces is buying the wood to dry the fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish and wood for her business.
 
She plans to build her house and educate her children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more fish and wood for her business

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Vilma Macedonia, tiene 52 años de edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijos. Ella es socia del grupo "Nuevo Horizonte", éste grupo se caracteriza por ser muy unido y responsable.
La Sra. Vilma Macedonia se dedica desde hace tres años a la venta de ropa el cual ofrece a sus amigos y familiares. Ella inició éste negocio vendiendo medias y ropa interior. Poco a poco fue incrementando su mercadería y a la vez aumentó sus ganancias. Gracias a su trabajo puede cubrir los gastos de estudios de sus hijos. Uno de sus anhelos es poner un bazar en una zona comercial.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería como ropa para damas y niños para implementar su negocio y aprovechar la temporada de fiestas patrias.
texts.en:
Vilma Macedonia, age 52, is married and has six children.  She is a member of the Nuevo Horizonte group.  This group is known for being very united and responsible.

Vilma Macedonia has been selling clothes to her friends and family for three years.  She started this business by selling stockings and underwear.  Little by little she was increasing her merchandise while she increased her sales.  Thanks to her work she is able to cover her children’s educational expenses.  

One of her aspirations is to set up a bazaar in a commercial zone.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise like women’s and children’s clothing for her business and to take advantage of the season of the National Holidays.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a stove and new kitchen tools for her baking business

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en:
Oretha is 43 years old and lives in Kakata town. She is married and has four children between the ages of 14 and 23; three are in school and all of them live at home. 

For the past 15 years she has been involved in business, and currently she sells fish in the local market. One of her main challenges is that the price of fish is very high. Since she doesn’t have enough income to buy more fish to meet her customers’ needs, she is requesting a loan to purchase more fish for her business.

She plans to build her house and expand her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more fish to meet her customers’ needs

loans.name: Sameera

texts.en:
Sameera is a 32-year-old woman, who is married and a mother to one daughter. Sameera is a school employee and gets a low salary which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past three years, Sameera has been working in agriculture with the rest of the family members, which has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover the costs.

Sameera is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing and installing a new plastic cover on their greenhouse. Taking out this loan will allow Sameera and her family to produce a better crop and thus increase their sales and improve the family's income.

Sameera is photographed next to the family's greenhouse.

loans.use: To install a new plastic cover on the greenhouse

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy   is a mother of five children. She is  35 years  old, married and lives at  Gardnersville. Her children  are between the  ages of  2 and  19 years  old. She has been selling body cream, hair grease, body powder, children's underwear and other items in  the  open market square  for the past  fifteen  years. 

A challenge she is faced with is the rainy season. With   the loan given her,   she is going to use  the profit  to buy more goods and find a suitable location for the  business. She   is requesting  a loan to  purchase   more body cream, body powder, hair grease and   children's  underwear  for  the business. Her  plan  for   the  future  is  to  build  a house.

loans.use: to  purchase   more body cream, body powder, hair grease and   children's  underwear  for  her business.

loans.name: Migdalia

texts.es: Migdalia de 29 Años de edad, labora como docente de primaria de la Escuela Paulino Halsall desde hace muchos años, ella cuenta con la ayuda econòmica de su compañero de vida que asume los gastos del hogar, como actividad adicional en su tiempo libre se dedican al destace de res una vez a la semana de los cuales obtienen ingresos  adicionales que les permiten brindar un poco de comodidad a sus hijos. solicita su  Credito para comprar materiales de construcciòn ya que piensa realizarle un anexo a su casita. Su mayor sueño es mejorar poco a poco su condiciones de vida de su familia, gozar de salud y que sus hijos crezcan en un ambiente agradable .
texts.en:
Migdalia is 29, and has been working for many years as a primary school teacher in the Paulino Halsall School. She the financial support of her life partner, who assumes responsibility for the household expenses. 

As an additional activity in their spare time, they do cattle butchering once a week. From this they earn additional income that allows them to offer a little comfort to their children. 

She is requesting her loan in order to buy building materials, as she intends to add a room to her small house. Her greatest dream is to gradually improve her family's living conditions, to enjoy good health, and that her children grow up in a pleasant environment.

loans.use: To add a room to her home.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie lives with her husband and three children in Gardnersville. She is 45 years old and her children are between the ages of 11 and 25 years. All three of them are attending school.
Mamie is a hardworking woman that has been involved in this business for the past seven years. She sells palm oil in the market. She likes this kind of business and the way she interacts with her customers. With the profit she buys more palm oil and attends to her family's needs. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for the business. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Jose Adalberto

texts.es: Don Josè Adalberto se desempeña como guarda de seguridad desde hace dos años y medio el cual ha demostrado ser un hombre responsable y  muy trabajador, su esposa se encarga del cuido de sus hijos y de los quehaceres del hogar, son una familia humilde pero  bien unida.  Solicita  su credito, para construir la cocina de su vivienda, la cual esta como sala cocina y quiere independizarla.  Su mayor sueño en la vida es gozar de estabilidad laboral, mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda y que su familia goce de salud.
texts.en:
Josè Adalberto has been working as a security guard for two and a half years. He has shown himself to be a responsible and very hard-working man. 

His wife takes care of their children and the household chores. They are a humble family, but very close-knit. He is requesting the loan in order to build the kitchen of his house. It is currently a combined main room and kitchen, and he wants to make it separate.  

His greatest dream in life is to have stable employment, to improve their home's infrastructure, and for his family to enjoy good health.

loans.use: To build a kitchen.

loans.name: Kpannah

texts.en: Kpannah is 49 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is married and her husband is a driver; they have seven children, ages 8 to 29 years old, and four live at home. Six are married. For the past five years she has been operating a little restaurant where she sells Liberian food. She started this business with a loan from her mother. She enjoys her business because she has a lot of customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice, oil, fish and spices for her business. She plans to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, fish and spices for her business

loans.name: Yassah

texts.en:
Yasseh,  40, is married with three children that are attending   school. They   are  between  the  ages  of 13 to 24   years  old and they all  live  at  Gardnersville. 

Yasseh  has a table  in the market  where she has  been selling  body cream, cosmetics, slippers, children's accessories, and  bath towels for the past 10 years. She is proud of her business because she is able to contribute to the expenditures in the home.

She has requested a loan to purchase more cosmetics, body cream, slippers, and children's accessories  for the  business. Her plan for the future is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, body cream, slippers, and children's accessories for the  business.

loans.name: Bandu

texts.en: Bandu is 31 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is married and has two children between the ages of 4 and 7. All of them attend school. For the past three years she has been operating a provision shop where she sells rice and red (palm) oil. Sometimes she has less customers, but most of the time she makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice and red oil to expand her business. In the future she hopes to expand her business into a big store.

loans.use: to purchase more rice and red oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Tamer

texts.en:
Tamer, who appears in the picture, is a 20-year-old single man. He is a worker and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover his needs.

Tamer wants to improve the family's home living conditions, so he is requesting a 500 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of painting the family's house in order to improve its condition. This will offer Tamer and the family members suitable and clean home conditions.

loans.use: To pay the costs of painting the house

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a married man with two children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has been operating a bar business for four years now. He saved his wages as a causal laborour and started the business. Inadequate capital is the biggest factor affecting the business. His dreams are to educate his children, buy a car and expand his business to new markets. Robert wants a loan to buy beers and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Ana Karen

texts.en:
Three years ago, 22-year-old Ana Karen and her husband jumped at the chance to buy a small shop in Mexico City that sells snacks, sodas and other types of groceries. It had always been Ana Karen’s dream to own her own business and she enjoys the flexibility that comes with being her own boss. 

For three years, Ana Karen and her husband have been managing this business using only a pen and a notebook, tracking sales and purchases for over 1,000 products without the help of any technology. This rudimentary system obviously does not help her to identify the best products, keep sufficient inventory on the shelves or even know the profitability of the store. Ana Karen purchased Tiendatek because she wants to have more control over her business than a pen-and-paper system permits, having real-time information about prices, inventory and suppliers at her fingertips. Ana Karen's goal is to improve the profitability of her business and increase the variety of products she offers her customers in order to continue providing stability for her family.

loans.use: to pay for a Tiendatek device to better manage her store through inventory control and performance reports

loans.name: Nominee

texts.en: Nominee is 38 years old and lives in Kakata Town. She is married and stopped her education at only grade five. She has five children between the ages of 13 to 25; all of them attend school. For the past eighteen years she has been selling used clothes in the local market. She enjoys her business because she has a lot of customers, and the profit she generates helps her buy food for her family. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. She plans to build a house and keep sending her children to school in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Freddy Alonso

texts.es: Freddy Alonso trabaja como tecnico de Propemce, su compañera de vida se desempeña como docente de secundaria en el Instituto Rubèn Darìo,  ambos son trabajadores que han luchado poco a poco por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de su familia. Este credito lo requiere para poder instalar la luz de su nueva casita, y ademas cercarla con alambre para brindar mayor seguridad a su propiedad. Su sueño es pasarse a su linda casita y seguir estudiando para ser una profesional con mucha experiencia.
texts.en:
Freddy Alonso works a technician for the Ministry of Small Enterprise, and his life companion works as a high school teacher at Rubén Dario School. Both are working people who have struggled to gradually improve their living conditions and those of their family. 

He requires this loan in order to install the electricity in his new home, and in addition to enclose it with a wire fence to provide greater security for his property. 

His dream is to move into his lovely home and continue studying to be a professional with a great deal of experience.

loans.use: To install electricity.

loans.name: Abednego

texts.en:
Abednego is a 48-year-old man with four children and a resident of Kagadi, Uganda. He is a tailor and he has been in service for six years. He started as a produce dealer then after reaping tangible profits, he ventured into the tailoring business and he got a tender to supply school uniforms to three schools. 

Inadequate capital and high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations. He has dreams to build a permanent home and buy land for growing crops. Abednego wants a loan to buy textiles for making clothes.

loans.use: to buy textiles for making clothes.

loans.name: Fanta

texts.en: Fanta  and her husband live  at  Gardnersville. She is 35  years  old and has five children  that live  with her at  home   and are currently  in  school. They are between  the  ages  of  6  to 16  years  old. Her  husband  helps her  out  in this  business. She started  first  with a few  bags  of  charcoal, and she invested the profit  into  the  business. With the loan given her, she will buy more charcoal to improve the business and  help  her  husband  in supporting the family. She  is requesting a  loan  to purchase  more  bags  of  charcoal  for  the business. Her plan for the future is to  build  a place where she can stock  her charcoal.

loans.use: to purchase  more  bags  of  charcoal  for  the business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 48 years old and lives in Kakata town. She is married and her husband is a bus driver. They have four children ages 8 to 21 years old that live at home and are in school. For the past five years Esther has been operating a little shop where she sells bread and red oil. She started this business with 4,500 Liberian dollars. She enjoys her business because she has a lots of customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase  bread and red  oil for her business. She plans to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase  bread and red  oil for her business

loans.name: Shola

texts.en:
Shola is a 33-year-old woman. She is married and a mother to two sons and two daughters. Her husband is employed and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and expenses.

For the past five years, Shola has had her own beauty salon and she has a good reputation among customers. It is a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover its costs.

Shola is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new beauty salon kit, such as: hair and face and body creams, a collection of hair brushes and hair dryers. This will satisfy Shola's customers and improve the family's income.

Shola is photographed in her salon.

loans.use: To purchase new beauty salon kit

loans.name: Eduardo Jose

texts.es: Eduardo Jose habitante de Nueva Guinea, solicita 2do credito, para realizar compra de productos, para invertir  en su microempresa del taller de sistema de reparacion y mantenimienos de computadoras, también vende repuestos de computadoras, obteniendo su clientela de las diferentes instituciones del municipio, es un joven emprendedor, profesional con mucho deseo de superación academica y económica, siendo su negocio con buen inventario de productos, con este financiamiento espera aumentar su clientela y sus ingresos, pues de esta manera va satisfacer la demanda de productos de calidad que sus clientes le exigen.
texts.en:
Eduardo José, resident of Nueva Guinea, requests his second loan to be able to buy products to invest in his small business, a computer repair and maintenance workshop.  He also sells computer parts, obtaining his clients from the different institutions of the municipality.

He is an enterprising and professional young man, with much desire to overcome academically and economically. With a good inventory of products for his business, with this loan he hopes to increase his clients and his income, and through this he will satisfy the demand for quality products that his clients call for.

loans.use: to buy materials for his business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther  is  a  single  mother  who lives  in  Gardnersville. She is 48  years  old and  she  has  six  children that  are  grown  up  and are  independent. They  are  between  the  ages  of  30   to 38  years  old. Her  children helped  her   with  the  initial  capital  to  start  this  business. She   has  been  involved in  used  clothing  sales  for  the  past  sixteen  years. Her  business  makes  her  feel   independent.

She sells  used  clothes   like  ladies'  blouses and children's  clothes  for both  boys  and  girls. She use the profit to  improve  the  business  and  change  her  living  conditions.   She   is  requesting   a loan  to  purchase more ladies' blouses and children's clothes  for the business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to  purchase more ladies' blouses and children's clothes  for the business

loans.name: Meuling Elizabeth

texts.es: Meuling trabaja en una empresa llamada PAC, ademas en su tiempo se dedica a su pequeño negocio en tiempo libre, de la venta de ropa y zapatos, obtiendo ingresos adicionales que le permiten el sosten familiar, ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que asume los gastos del hogar. Solicita 2do refinanciamiento para la compra de materiales de construción y construir un dormitorio para su pequeña hija, de esta manera brindarle privacidad ahora que esta creciendo, ademas su familia contara con mejores condiciones de vida en su hogar, su sueños es tener una casa bonita y comoda.
texts.en:
Mueling works in a company called PAC. Furthermore, in her free time she works in a small clothing and shoe sales business, obtaining additional income that permit her to support her family.  Moreover, she has the support of her husband who takes on the household expenses.  

She requests her second loan to buy construction materials and build a bedroom for her small daughter.  In this way she will offer her privacy now that she is growing. Additionally, her family will have better living conditions in their home.  Her dream is to have a nice and comfortable house.

loans.use: to buy materials

loans.name: Benetta

texts.en:
Benetta lives in Gardnesville and is 44 years old. She is married with two children, ages 20 and 26. Her children are in school.

Benetta learned to sell from her mother. She has been involved in this business for the past eight years. She earns profits because she is the only person who sells coal in her community. She is proud because she earns her own income and helps her husband with the household expenses and her children's school fees.

Benetta is requesting a loan to purchase more bags of coal for her business. Her future plan is to build a shop in which to stock her coal.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of coal for her business.

loans.name: Dacia Iralda

texts.es: Dacia vive en las Orquideas donde mantiene su hogar con el servico de expreso escolar que brinda. Empezo el el negocio cunado adquirio una urgoneta hace 2 años y la venta de comida rapida desde hace 8 años atras. Ella vende pollos en palito y salchichas de chancho con chifles el frente de su casa. El expreso lo realiza todos los dias desde las 7:30 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, los fines de semana prepara las comidas ya que es cuando mas vende porque por lo general las familias estos dias pasean. Como es separa ambos negocios le ayudan a pagar sus gastos y poder brindarles una seguridad economica a sus hijos. El credito que solicita Dacia es para comprar pollos y salchichas para la venta. espera a futuro retomar la venta de pollos al mayor ya que le dejaba mejores ingresos y asi continuar adelante con el negocio.
texts.en: Dacia lives in Orquideas where she maintains her home with the express school transportation she provides. She began this business when she acquired a van two years ago and began selling fast food eight years ago. She sells chicken kabobs and pork sausage with banana chips in front of her home. She carries out this transportation service every day from 7:30 in the morning until 10 at night. On weekends she prepares food since it's when she sells more families generally go out on these days. As these businesses are separate they help her pay her expenses and enable her to provide financial security to her children. The loan that Dacia is requesting is to buy chicken and sausage to sell. In the future she hopes to take up selling wholesale chicken again since it gave her better earnings and thus continue forward with the business.

loans.use: to buy chicken and sausage.

loans.name: Blanca Agustina

texts.es: La sra. Blanca de 54 años de edad, es soltera, trabaja para el Hopsital asuncion como responsible de Central de Equipo, habita en casa propia con sus 2 nietos, los cuales cuida mientras su hija trabaja fuera del pais. Solicita su 9no credito para invertirlos en mejoras de su casa, contruira y acondicionara un espacio en la parte trasera de su casa para brindar mayor comodidad a sus nietos y cuando su hija venga cuente con su propio cuarto.  Cabe señalar que Blanca es una excelente persona y se caracteriza por su responsabilidad, ademas con los creditos anteriores ha logrado poco a poco ir mejorando su casita, construyendo en la parte de enfrente un pequeño garaje.
texts.en: Mrs. Blanca is 54 years old, is single, and works for the Asunción Hospital as the Director of the Medical Equipment Center.  She lives in her own home with her two grandchildren, who she cares for while her daughter works outside of the country.  She is asking for her 9th loan in order to invest in home improvements.  She will construct and finish a room in the back part of the house in order to offer more comfort to her grandchildren, and also so that when her daughter comes she can count on her own room.  It is worth noting that Blanca is an excellent person and is known for her responsibility.  In addition, with the previous loans she has been able to improve her home little by little, building a small garage in the front section.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Meatta

texts.en: Meatta    is  41  years  old  and lives at Gardnersville   with  her  husband  and  six  children. They   are between   the  ages  of  9  to  27  years  old.  For  the  past  nine  years  she  has  been  working hard  to  manage  her  business. She sells  body  powder, body  spray,  hair grease,  bath soap , washing soap, and bath towels.    She  will  invest   the  loan  given her  to  improve  her  business  and  improve her  children's  lives.  She is  requesting  a  loan  to  purchase  more  body  powder,  body  spray,  hair grease,     and  other  items  for  the  business. Her  dream  is to have a  shop  in the  future.

loans.use: to  purchase  more  body  powder,  body  spray,  hair grease,     and  other  items  for  the  business.

loans.name: Vahuie

texts.en: Vahuie    is 29  years  old  and single  with  three  children  between  the  ages  of  5 and 9  years  old. They  live  with  her  at  home  at  Gardnersville  and are  in school. Vahuie  is a hard-working   woman   who has been  trying hard  to  manage  her  business to sustain herself and her children. She has been  selling palm oil  for  the  past  six  years in  the  local  market. She  makes  profit  when  she  sells it and  she  uses  the  profit  to  buy  more palm oil  and  attend to her children's  needs.   She  is requesting a  loan to   purchase palm oil to  improve  her  business and  the  lives  of  her  children.   She plans to  build   a house in  the  future and educate her children.

loans.use: to   purchase palm oil to  improve her  business

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a fifty-five-year-old married man with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been operating a taxi for two years and with the earnings he has been able to pay school fees for his children. His hardships are taxes, theft, high fuel costs and mechanical breakdowns. His personal goal is buying a car and business goal is buying land to grow crops. Robert wants money to buy a new taxi.

loans.use: to buy  a new taxi.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a 30-year-old man, married with two children. His primary source of income is cattle trade; he buys bulls, fattens them for a period of 3 months and sells them at a profit. Richard began business as a means of survival. He had to do something that would fetch him income to take care of his family when he got married.

Richard inherited land from his father but it has become too small to contain his large herd of cattle. The client wishes to acquire more land, the reason why he applied for a loan. Richard visualizes tough times in the future, that's why he has to plan early. Land is more becoming expensive by the day; the earlier he expands, the better.

Richard plans to construct a permanent house for his family. At the moment he resides in a grass-thatched house. The cold from the house affects his children most. He hopes that the proceeds from the laon will help him expand and get his dream home. 

Richard faces challenges of financial difficulty but with UGAFODE MFI, he believes this will be a problem of the past. Since he describes himself as a hardworking man, he will be able to pay back the loan.

loans.use: To buy land

loans.name: Maria Abigail

texts.es:
La profesora Maria Abigail de 66 años de edad es soltera, labora para el MINED desde hace mas 20 años como docente de primaria en una escuela rural donde imparte el pan de la enseñanza a niños de esa comunidad. 

Esta solicitando  su 10mo credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa  construcyendo un anexo que le servira para tener mayor comodidad y espacio en su casa. Con el credito anterior logro hacer una pared y reparar el techo de su casa mejorando un poquito las condiciones de vida de su familia.  Espera poder seguir contanto con el apoyo de kiva y afodenic para poder ver su sueño hecho realidad, una vivienda bonita y segura para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Abigail is a 66 year old teacher and is single.  She has worked for MINED for 20 years as an elementary school teacher in a rural school where the gives the gift of knowledge to the children of the community.

She is requesting her tenth loan with the objective to continue improving her house, building an annex that will provide more comfort and space.  With the previous loan she was able to build a wall and repair the roof of her house, improving her family's living conditions a little.  She hopes to be able to continue with the support of Kiva and Afodenic to be able to see her dream become reality, a nice and secure home for her family.

loans.use: to repair walls

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a 29-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been farming for 10 years. Her hardships are customers not paying on time, price fluctuations, inflation, high fuel cost and transportation costs. Her personal goal is educating her children and her business goals are diversifying business, buying land to grow crops and expanding her business to new markets. Agnes wants the loan to buy pesticides and pay workers.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and pay workers

loans.name: Ester

texts.en: Ester is a 28-year-old woman with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. After selling off her cocoa, she started a retail business with the profits earned. She is challenged by price fluctuations and customers not paying on time. Her dreams are educating her children up to the university level and moving her business to a more permanent location. The purpose of the loan is to buy sugar, soap, salt and cups to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, salt and cups to sell.

loans.name: Ushindi Group

texts.en:
Deus, who is in his late 20s, is single with one child who goes to school.  He has been having a motorcycle business for one and a half years now. He works from 6.00 am to 8.00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be his 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which he wants to use for buying another motorcycle.  His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

Deus will share this loan with his loan group "Ushindi" with 10 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Yunicent

texts.en: Yunicent is a 40-year old married man with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in local brew for five years and he also has a banana plantation. His hardship is price fluctuation, inflation and poor yields from the banana plantation where he gets raw materials for local brew. His personal goal is educating his children and his business goal is diversifying business to include a retail shop. Yunicent wants the loan to buy fertilizers and mulch for the banana plantation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and mulch

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 42-year-old woman, who is married and a mother to four sons and four daughters. Her husband is a worker and gets a low income, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and children's education expenses.

For the past two years, Amal has had a grocery store, which has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover its costs. Amal is requesting a 600 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing needed stock of basic groceries that customers often request such as rice, sugar and  milk. This will increase sales and increase the family's income.

Amal is photographed in the grocery store.

loans.use: To purchase needed stock of basic groceries for sale

loans.name: Fadel

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 36 years old, married and has five children.

Fadel is a hairdresser for men and has owned a barber shop since 2011. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

He applied for $2400 loan to renovate the shop. He is aiming to develop his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate the shop

loans.name: Belive Group

texts.en:
Valeria, who is in her early 30s, is married with three children; two of them go to school and another one is still too young.  She has been selling fried cassava for one year now. She works from 6.00 am till 7.30 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She wants to use it for buying a half sack of cassava, some cooking oil and charcoal. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

Valeria will share this loan with her loan group "Believe" which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a  half  sack of cassava, some cooking oil and  charcoal.

loans.name: Omelvin J.

texts.en: Omelvin J. is 35 years old and lives in Logan Town. He is married and has two children, ages 9 and 12, who attend school. Omelvin J. has been operating a provisions shop for the past two years now. He sells soap, toothpaste, rice, oil, tissue, and batteries, among other things. He has little capital to operate his business, so he is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, soap, tissue, batteries, and toothpaste. He plans to build a house for his children,and educate them.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, soap, tissue, batteries, and toothpaste for his business.

loans.name: Sam Art

texts.en: Sam Art is 51 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a construction worker and earns about $4 per day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is construction foreman who earns about $7 each day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sam Art is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. In addition, a part of this money will be used to purchase construction tools for her husband to use in his construction work. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a 34-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been teaching for 10 years and,with his salary, he has been able to provide the basics to his family. His personal goal is to educate his children and he also has a business plan of starting up a piggery project. William wants money to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Gabriel Antonio

texts.es:
Gabriel se mudó de su municipio natal en búsqueda de mejores oportunidades laborales y comenzó a trabajar en diferentes lugares para sostener sus propios gastos y poder contribuir económicamente en el hogar de sus padres y sus hermanos para que gocen de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Con unos ahorros decidió montar su propio negocio y fue así como inició con una venta de productos de uso personal; en un principio tenía el negocio en la calle pero con mucho esfuerzo logró ubicarse en un local y esto hizo que sus ventas se incrementaran considerablemente. Ahora con este negocio de venta de productos de uso personal puede generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Buscando satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, Gabriel requiere un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal para surtir su negocio ya que algunos productos se han venido agotando.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital que tiene y su negocio logrará salir adelante, generando mejores ingresos para el hogar y así brindando una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Gabriel moved from the municipality where he was born in search of better work opportunities.  He began to work in different places to support himself and contribute financially to the household which included his parents and siblings, so that they could enjoy a better quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.  With some savings, he decided to start his own business, and it was in this way that he started selling personal products.  At the start, he had a business selling in the street, but with a lot of effort he managed to set up his business in a store and this made his sales increase considerably.  Now, with this personal products business, he is able to generate the income he needs for his household where he lives with his wife and their 4 children.  Looking to satisfy his customers, Boris needs a loan to buy personal products to stock his store and to replace some products that he has run out of.

In this way, he will overcome his lack of capital and his business will make progress, generating more income for his household so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy personal products to stock his store, and to replace some products that he has run out of

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client aged 27 years old, single and lives with his family members.

Ali owns a food market since 2007, selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their demands. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $3000 as a youth loan to pay the annual rent for the shop. He is aiming to earn more profits which will offer a better living standard for the whole family.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for the shop

loans.name: Al-Khayriah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Khayriah and consists of two ladies (Badriah and Rima) and two men (Habib and Farooq) who work hard and live in Aden, Yemen.

Badriah is 34 years old. She has been selling food and phone recharge cards for the past four years. She started her business by selling phone recharge cards and with hard work and perseverance, she succeeded in growing both as a person and in her business. She is applying for a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB to buy additional food and phone recharge cards.

loans.use: to buy additional food and phone recharge cards

loans.name: Bunnary

texts.en: Bunnary is 24 years old. She is married and blessed with one child in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than a year, earning approximately $4 per day. Her husband (who is joining her in the picture) is an arc welder who earns about $7 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Bunnary is requesting a loan of $1400 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the  money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to send her child to a good school and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Abdel Wahhab

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 51 years old, married and has five children.

Abdel Wahab owns an advertising agency, designing and manufacturing billboards and shop signage. He has  sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their demands. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

He applied for $2800 loan to buy a printing machine specialized to his business. He is aiming to develop his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a printing machine specialized to his business

loans.name: Lai

texts.en: Lai is 51 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been a farmer since 1990, earning an income of about $2 per day. Her husband makes palm sugar, which he has done since 1990, earning a profit of around $4 per day. Two of Lai's children are working in a factory, earning around $6 per day. Each month, Lai has to spend $45 on food, $5 on utility expenses and around $35 on other expenses. She is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase a tailoring machine for her daughter. This loan will help her family increase their income. In the future, she hopes she can open a store for her daughter and build a new big house.

loans.use: purchase a tailoring machine for her daughter

loans.name: Hamza

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 41 years old, married and has five children.

Hamza is a carpenter and has owned a  carpentry workshop since 2005. He makes doors, bedroom closets and other items.  He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their demands. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $2400 as loan in order to buy a big generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a big generator.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 21-year-old single man whose father is a worker in addition to his involvement in agriculture. For the past two years, Mohammad has had an Internet cafe which has been a profitable project but does not yet bring in enough money to cover his operating costs.

Mohammad is requesting a youth loan from FATEN to help him complete the purchase of new computers for his business. This will allow him to expand the scope of his work, improve his enterprise, and increase the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase new computers for his Internet cafe.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad, a 25-year-old youth client from Iraq, is married and has three children. Ahmad has owned a small grocery shop since 2006, and with his experience has acquired a deep understanding of local customers and their needs. He enjoys a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

Ahmad is requesting a $2400 loan to install shelves in the shop and buy more goods to sell. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits in order to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to install shelves in the shop and purchase more goods to sell.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Don Ricardo se desempeña como docente de la Escuela Rubèn Darìo # 2 desde hace 19 años con gran eficiencia y honestidad, es un hombre reconocido en su comunidad que se ha destacado por ser excelente padre y  maestro. Este dinero lo necesita para invertirlo en pequeños arreglos de su cocina y asi brindarle mejor comodidad a su familia, tambien  se dedica  a la   siembra de quequisque ya que es un hombre que le encanta progresar. Su mayor  sueño en la vida es que su linda familia goce de salud y que permanezca unida.
texts.en:
For 19 years, Ricardo has been working as a teacher at Rubèn Darìo School # 2, with great efficiency and integrity. He is a man well known in his community, who has distinguished himself for being an excellent father and teacher.  

He needs this money to spend on some small repairs to his kitchen, so as to offer better comfort to his family. He also grows quequisque (type of root vegetable), as he is a man who loves to get ahead. 

His greatest dream in life is that his beautiful family enjoy good health and remain close-knit.

loans.use: To repair his kitchen.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a 30-year-old man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is married and has two children. He owns a music library in his town. His personal goals are to have a good-looking permanent house for his family and to upgrade himself in his studies. In order to diversify his income sources he also started a retail shop and the business is going on well despite the hindrances of inadequate capital and price fluctuations. Charles intends to use the loan to buy sugar, soap, plastics and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, plastics and rice

loans.name: Nubia Efigenia

texts.es: Doña Nubia se desempeña como Enfermera del Minsa desde hace 21 años, la cual ha  demostrado ser una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora, es bien querida por sus compañeros de trabajo por ser una mujer emprendedora y servicial. Solicita su credito para comprar  materiales de construcciòn para posteriormente iniciar la construccion de 2 cuartos y asi poco a poco ir mejorando su nivel de vida familiar.  Su mayor sueño en la vida es seguir profesionalizandose  para ser cada dia mejor y gozar de salud y estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
Nubia has been working for 21 years as a nurse with Minsa (Nicaraguan Health Ministry).  She has shown herself to be a very hard-working and responsible woman.

She is well liked by her co-workers, because she is a resourceful and helpful woman.  

She is requesting her loan in order to buy construction materials to then begin construction of two rooms, so as to gradually improve her family's standard of living.  

Her greatest dream in life is to continue her professional development, in order to be better each day, and to enjoy good health and job stability.

loans.use: To buy building materials.

loans.name: Abdelhaleem

texts.en:
Abdelhaleem is a 35-year-old man. He is married and a father to one son and three daughters. He is a worker and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

Abdelhaleem is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of repairing his house by painting and installing tiles. This will improve the living conditions for his family. Taking this loan will offer to the family comfortable home conditions so they can enjoy living in the house.

Abdelhaleem appears in the picture.

loans.use: to repair his house and improve its condition.

loans.name: Akil

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client who is 26 years old, married and has one child.

Akil owns a small grocery shop. He has worked in this business since 2006. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $1800 to paint the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to paint his shop.

loans.name: Mrika

texts.en:
Mrika is a forty-seven-year-old married woman who has five children ranging from eight to twenty-three years old. They all live in northern Albania. “Raising my children hasn’t been easy, financially and otherwise,” she says. “This is why six years ago I started my own business in an effort to be able to provide more to my family, and I am happy I did,” she continues. 

Mrika has been able to establish a good and steady clientele because of her good service and is now planning to repair the existing stable or build a good one from scratch for her animals. She doesn’t have any saved money though, and this is the reason why she is requesting a Kiva loan via VisionFund Albania. She wants to start building the stable before the bitter winter weather kicks in. She is fully aware that without lenders’ support, she will not be able to carry out her plan.

loans.use: To build a stable for her livestock

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 32 years old and married but still doesn’t have any children.

Mohamad has a shop for changing the engine oil in cars. He has had a small garage since 2000. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $2000 to buy a generator and increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a generator and increase his inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy goats

loans.name: Marbelly Ramona

texts.es: La joven Marbellys de 22 años de edad, se desempeña como docente de primaria desde hace 3 años, su esposo trabaja en la alcaldia como tecnico, es una mujer  trabajadora que le encanta su trabajo como docente de primaria. Solicita su credito, para construir una habitaciòn en la casita de su mamà, pues con el credito anterior logro reparar la cocina y ahora desea acondicionar su propio espacio para ella y su esposo. Su mayor sueño en la vida  es construir su casa propia, seguir estudiando para ser una docente con mucha experiencia y que su familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Marbellys is 22, and has been working as a primary teacher for three years. Her husband works as a technician for the municipality.

She is a hard-working woman who loves her job as a primary teacher. 

She is applying for her loan in order to build a room in her mother's small house. With the previous loan, she managed to repair the kitchen, and now she wishes to fit up their own space for her and her husband.

Her greatest dream in life is to build her own house, to continue studying to be a teacher with a great deal of experience, and that her family always stay  together.

loans.use: To build a room.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a thirty-eight-year-old married woman with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been operating a retail business for three years. With the proceeds from the business she has been able to pay school fees for her children. Her hardship is customers not paying on time, and her personal goal is educating her children. Her business goal is moving her business to a more permanent location. Agnes wants money to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Elgarida

texts.en:
Elgarida is a 50-year-old woman dealing in livestock trade. She borrowed UGX 3,000,000 to buy more bulls for sale. Elgarida has been in that business for the last 10 years and has gained a lot of experience in it.

Elgarida credits her success to her humble beginnings and determination. She says that she started business with only three goats but now, she can sell three bulls on a single market day. Though her earnings are still low, about 30,000 Ugx per week, her business has kept her going and she supplements it with her other sources of income, especially banana sales.

Elgarida says she still faces a challenge of travelling for long distances looking for buyers for her bulls. Though her son helps her out, she has grown old and is no longer strong. She hopes to buy a motorcycle in the near future to aid her movement.

Elgarida still has hope that with financial access, she will be able to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy more bulls for resale

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas de casa.	
Tem um negócio próprio de compra e venda de produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, farinha, trigo, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro espera progredir no seu negócio e na sua profissão, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é desenvolver o seu negócio e se tornar num grande comerciante.
texts.en:
Married with 3 school children, Celeste lives in her own home with her family and supports her mother by sending money for household expenses.  
She has a business buying and selling various basic foods.  With the requested loan, she will buy food products (such as; oil, flour, wheat, sugar etcetera) in order to increase her available inventory of goods.
In the future, she hopes to improve her work and is committed to repaying the loan in order to request further loans from Hluvuku.
Her goals are to grow her business and become a better merchant.

loans.use: to buy and sell food products (such as; oil, flour, wheat, sugar etcetera)

loans.name: Laylai

texts.en: Laylai is a 21-year-old single lady. She is a university student. Laylai has applied to this loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en:
Duaa is a 21-year-old single lady.

Duaa makes use of her free time to make different colors of teddy bears and kids toys. She takes the fabric and the needed materials and turns them into toys for sale.

Now she is thinking of expanding the business and opening her own shop for selling them as toys and gifts, so she has applied for this youth loan to buy more material and increase her productivity.

loans.use: to buy more material and increase her productivity

loans.name: Al-Nourin Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Nourin and is made up of  Nour, Namah, Fatima and Azizh. They live in Sana'a, Yemen. They took a loan of 200,000 YER.

Fatima is 51 years old, married and lives in Sana'a, Yemen. She is the second woman from the right in the photo. She is a housewife. The main hardship that she faces  is the lack of money. so, She is requesting a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB to purchase fridge.  She is the leader of the four members and she hopes to offer for her family good life.

loans.use: to purchase fridge for personal use

loans.name: Norn

texts.en: Norn is 38 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has worked in a factory in Phnom Penh city since 2004, earning an income of around $2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker, making $2 per day. Each month, she has to spend about $40 on food, around $5 on utilities and $55 on other expenses. Norn is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike to go to work. This loan will help her to reduce her transportation costs. In the future, she hopes she can build a new house, open a grocery store and support her children in higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike go to work.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha, 48 years old and a married woman, is the mother of one daughter.

Maha is starting a small business selling perfumes at home, and she has applied for this loan to buy more collections of perfumes based on what her friends and neighbors are asking for.

In the future she wants to open a small perfume and cosmetics shop as an expansion for her business.

loans.use: to buy more collections of perfumes

loans.name: Razan

texts.en:
Razan is a 27-year-old married housewife. She is a mother caring for two children.

Razan is establishing a small beauty salon business at home. She has bought some of the required equipment and there is still more that is missing, so she has applied for this youth loan to get another hairdryer and other tools.

loans.use: to get another hairdryer and other tools

loans.name: Saad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, married and has three children.

Saad has owned a shoe shop since 2004. He sells men’s shoes. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their demands. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $2,000 to paint the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to paint his shop

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en:
Aziza is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Aziza is a 58-year-old woman. She is married and a mother to five sons and two daughters. She is employed and receives a small salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and their educational expenses.

For the past five years, Aziza and her family members have been working in agriculture, which has been a profitable project. But they need more support to cover their costs.

Aziza is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to provide a share of the family's costs of purchasing seasonal seedlings and fertilizers. It will allow them to produce a better crop and thus increase their sales and improve the income to live in better conditions.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Aseel

texts.en:
Aseel is a 32-year-old married woman caring for her two children. They live in a rented house.

To be able to support the family with her husband, Aseel has started a small business selling cosmetic products at home.

She has applied for this loan to add makeup tools and products to what she has now.

loans.use: to add makeup tools and products for selling.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en: Amer, a 42-year-old married man, is a mechanic who has a car repair shop. He wants to add a section to his shop to sell spare parts, and for that he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add a section to his car repair shop to spare parts

loans.name: Abdulrahman

texts.en: AbdulRahman is 35 years old and married. He has only one boy so far. Abdularahman owns a small food market in his neighborhood. He has applied for this loan to expand his inventory of food items.

loans.use: expand his inventory of food items

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en: Maryam is a 51-year-old married woman. She has a small clothing sales business at home. She included a few of the items she sells in the photograph. Maryam has applied for this loan to buy more clothing items to sell and thus increase her profit.

loans.use: to buy more clothing items to sell
